UI/SharewareText: Stay tuned for the full-blown Sulfur experience to unfold in the full game! You can expect dozens of new enemies, a bunch of new characters, and hundreds of modifications to your weapons - giving you thousands of unique combinations. Also, multiple new areas, bosses and loads more weapons to mess around with! Expect many more hours of supreme hardcore video game entertainment.

Endless/Card_AmmoGain_Description: Increase ammo gain by AMOUNT_X (permanent per run).
Endless/Card_Bonanza_Description: Enemies will drop normal loot this stage.
Endless/Card_Chonk_Description: Enemies will be AMOUNT_X slower, AMOUNT_Y larger, but have AMOUNT_Z health next stage. AMOUNT_W increased XP.
Endless/Card_DoubleDamage_Description: Your damage output is doubled for the duration of the stage.
Endless/Card_ExplodableBarrels_Descripti: Spawns explodable barrels on the next stage.
Endless/Card_FullHealth_Description: Replenishes your health to it's maximum value.
Endless/Card_GearChest_Description: Summons AMOUNT_X gear chest(s) in the stage.
Endless/Card_Honor_Description: Melee only next stage, AMOUNT_X increased XP.
Endless/Card_Indestructible_Description: No durability loss on any items for AMOUNT_X Waves.
Endless/Card_InfiniteAmmo_Description: No ammo will be consumed when reloading for AMOUNT_X Waves.
Endless/Card_Inflation_Description: Enemies grow continuously in size and health next stage. AMOUNT_X increased XP.
Endless/Card_Lifesteal_Description: AMOUNT_X lifesteal for the duration of the stage.
Endless/Card_MaxHP_Description: Increase Max Health by AMOUNT_X (permanent for run).
Endless/Card_MeleeDamage_Description: Melee damage will AMOUNT_X for the remainder of the stage.
Endless/Card_MeleeXP_Description: Defeating enemies with melee provides double the XP shards for the duration of the stage.
Endless/Card_MoveSpeed_Description: AMOUNT_X increased movement speed (permanent for run).
Endless/Card_Pass_Description: Pass on the offer. Get stamps.
Endless/Card_RandomAmmo_Description: Receive AMOUNT_X of a random ammo type.
Endless/Card_Raptor_Description: Enemies will be AMOUNT_X faster, AMOUNT_Y smaller, but have AMOUNT_Z health next stage. AMOUNT_W increased XP.
Endless/Card_RepairAll_Description: Repairs everything you have carrying in your inventory.
Endless/Card_Reroll_Description: Don’t like your choices? Get new ones.
Endless/Card_SeveralItems_Description: AMOUNT_X ITEM_X will spawn in the stage.
Endless/Card_SlowMotion_Description: Slows time for the remainder of the stage.
Endless/Card_Storage_Description: Summons your STORAGE_X in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonAlly_Description: Summons a tough ALLY_X to fight for you in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonCommonChest_Descripti: Summons AMOUNT_X common chest(s) in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonCooking_Description: Summons a cooking station in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonNPC_Description: Summons a NPC_X vendor in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonRandomAllies_Descript: Summons AMOUNT_X tough random allies to fight for you this stage.
Endless/Card_SummonRandomService_Descrip: Summons a random Service station in the stage.
Endless/Card_SummonRandomStorage_Descrip: Summons a random Storage in the stage.
Endless/Card_TheOoze_Description: All enemies have an extra random mutation next stage. AMOUNT_X increased XP.
Endless/Card_Thorns_Description: Return AMOUNT_X of damage taken, before armor reduction (permanent per run).
Endless/Card_Volatile_Description: All enemies are Bombs next stage. AMOUNT_X increased XP.
Endless/Card_WeaponChest_Description: Summons AMOUNT_X weapon chest(s) in the stage.
Endless/Card_WeaponTypeBuff_Description: Any WEAPONTYPE_X weapon does AMOUNT_X extra damage for the duration of the stage.
Endless/Card_XpIncrease_Description: Increase amount of XP from shards by AMOUNT_X (permanent per run).
Endless/Card_XpRange_Description: Increase the shard pull range by AMOUNT_X (permanent for run).
Achievements/AMULET_FREE_DESCRIPTION: Beat an area without a charged amulet.
Achievements/BACKPACK_HERO_DESCRIPTION: Complete a run while freezing inventory rows.
Achievements/DUNGEON_DWELLER_DESCRIPTION: Stay in the dungeon for 10 minutes.
Achievements/EAGLE_EYE_DESCRIPTION: Kill 20 enemies through a sniper scope.
Achievements/EXPLOSIVE_PERSONALITY_DESCR: Kill 5 enemies with a single grenade.
Achievements/FINNISH_PRIDE_DESCRIPTION: Set 6 enemies on fire with one Molotov.
Achievements/FORBIDDEN_DISH_DESCRIPTION: Add human meat organ to the cauldron.
Achievements/GETTING_STARTED_DESCRIPTION: Complete every area in early access.
Achievements/GOURMET_CHEF_DESCRIPTION: Cook escargot and cuississe de graneeuxe.
Achievements/HEAVY_LIFTER_DESCRIPTION: Carry more than 6 weapons in your inventory.
Achievements/IRON_WILL_DESCRIPTION: Finish all areas in a row without dying.
Achievements/JACK_OF_ALL_TRADES_DESCRIPT: Use every type of weapon once.
Achievements/KNIFES_EDGE_DESCRIPTION: Kill 3 enemies in melee combat within 5 seconds.
Achievements/NOT_GOOD_ENOUGH: Not Good Enough to Throw Grenades
Achievements/NOT_THAT_BAD_DESCRIPTION: Finish an area with only the Dirk.
Achievements/OIL_IT_UP_DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 oils to a single weapon.
Achievements/ONE_SHOT_WONDER_DESCRIPTION: Kill a boss with a single shot.
Achievements/PACIFIST_DESCRIPTION: Finish a level without hurting a single enemy.
Achievements/PACK_MULE_DESCRIPTION: Carry more than 20 unique items in your inventory.
Achievements/SMART_GUY_DESCRIPTION: Charge the amulet by paying the Gravedigger.
Achievements/SPELUNKER_DESCRIPTION: Find a hidden chests in the Caves.
Achievements/SURVIVOR_DESCRIPTION: Complete a level without taking damage.
Achievements/UNSTOPPABLE_DESCRIPTION: Complete a level without taking any damage from enemies.
Achievements/WASTE_NOT_DESCRIPTION: Repair your weapon to (almost) full durability
TutorialHints/Amulet: Press INPUT_X to bring out the Amulet
TutorialHints/Chest: Press INPUT_X to open the chest
TutorialHints/Fire: Press INPUT_X to shoot your weapon
TutorialHints/Inventory: Press INPUT_X to open your inventory
TutorialHints/PickupItems: Press INPUT_X to pick up items
TutorialHints/WakizashiCharge: Hold INPUT_X to Draw the Wakizashi
TutorialHints/WakizashiRelease: Release INPUT_X to Attack with the Wakizashi

EntityAttributes/Stat_WearingRudolfNose: Gives your face a chrismassy glow
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_AintthatsomethingJus: Ain't that something. Just took you a few thousand laps, piss ant.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Andyoumightnotrememb: And you might not remember... but it was vengeful rage that had you end up in that tree.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Anywaynoonewearingfl: Anyway, no one wearing flesh has a chance in hell, no pun intended, of breaking out of Sulfur.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_AvastForestliesupahe: A vast Forest lies up ahead, if you continue past the Hedgemaze entrance.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Beforeyousayanything: Before you say anything... I know you don’t remember. Just listen... Look behind you, right?
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_BeyondthewallsoftheS: Beyond the walls of the Shav’Wa is a great empty space of sand and despair, The Desert, where only the adapted can truly thrive. It also known as "The edge of Sulfur." You will hopefully learn to see why.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_BringmeclosertoitsoI: Bring me closer to it so I can absorb some of its primordial essence.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Citizensdefythiscerf: Citizens defy this cerfew due to everyday life being impossible without venturing outside, which has a tendency to be fatal.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Followthepathheading: Follow the path heading right from the Sewers entrance. The small Maze leading to the base of Lucia’s castle lies ahead.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_ForoneIcanuseittotak: For one, I can use it to take us back to safety once I’ve charged myself with it’s powers. You know, in case things get hairy, or it would be advantageous to regroup.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Forseconditwillalowu: For second, it will allow us to banish the witch's curse up to the point where the shrine leads us, letting us access new areas as well as eventually paving the way to redemption for your people.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_GladyouaskedTheresth: Glad you asked. There’s the teeny weeny aspect of being able to turn back time, and taking you and your churchgoers back to the land of the living.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_HowdoIputthisBloodof: How do I put this? Blood of the mother. Pure essence.The most potent form of life... goop, as well as an abstraction of the power that defines the laws of physics.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Imfilledtothebrimand: I’m filled to the brim, and could take us home if you please. But perhaps you have something else on your mind?
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Imreadyforoneofthefo: I’m ready for one of the four obvious questions now.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Imsureyoudhaveanothe: I’m sure you’d have another name for that concept... with your profession and all. But you'll be surprised as to its nature.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Imyourconciousnessth: I’m your conscience... the angel on your left shoulder... or a hallucination. Whatever fits to make you focus at the task at hand. It's important to us both.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itsbeastsareformidab: Its beasts are formidable. Deadly and beautiful in their own sort of way. Don’t get lost in there.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itsextremelydifficul: It’s extremely difficult to tame and needs to be used incredibly intently to yield any wanted results.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itsgoingtocomeinvery: It’s going to come in very handy, as I know how to wield it.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itssortofthewaitingr: It’s sort of the waiting room for the true afterlife.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itstheclosestthingst: It’s the closest thing to what you would call hell that exists in Sulfur.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Itwillleadyoustraigh: It will lead you straight to the foot of Lucias’s Castle, which is your next target. Bring your swim gear if you got any.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Justfollowthepathtot: Just follow the path to the right of the entrance to the Caves.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Likethisneverhappene: Like this never happened, and getting your revenge. I’d say that would be the ultimate goal, wouldn’t you? We need to find a multitude of shrines for me to make that happen.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Onceusedupthepowerwo: Once used up, the power would need to be refilled in one of these shrines.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Orperhapsyouwontmake: Or perhaps you won't make it next time? Isn't this exciting?
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Rememberyourestuckwi: Remember, you're stuck with me if you ever want that church to stay non-toasted.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Searchthepathbeyondt: Search the path beyond the Forest, it will lead you to a mysterious land of “unveiled” reptile people.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Sheisabeingthatofimm: She is a being that of immense power an hatred, due to her own use of the shrine placed in her castle. She will most likely know that you’re coming.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Thatfireballyoujusts: That fireball you just saw enter this cave... that’s the witch that burned down your church... and everyone in it.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_ThatshisnameAbitking: That's his name? A bit kingly for a brittle fool. Haha!
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Thecurfewisconstanta: The curfew is constant and indefinite. Rumor has it Lucia can’t stand the thought of... well, people.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Theonlythingyouneedt: The only thing you need to know is that we’ve been friends for a long time.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Thereswaystoundoallo: There’s ways to undo all of this. I will help you.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_TheroadoutofSulfuris: The road out of Sulfur is long... but it’s even longer if there’s a mountain of evil slime in the way.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Theydothingsintheiro: They do things in their own way, and answer to no one. Be on your guard.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_ThiswillgoonforeverA: This will go on forever. And there's nothing you or your little shrink can do about it.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Totherightofthetowni: To the right of the town is the entrance to the Sewers, the witch's curse has been dispelled at it’s entrance due to it’s proximity to the shrine you activated at the southern end of Town.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Wecanonlymatchherstr: We can only match her strength if we too utilize them. You might have noticed that death, and time, isn’t really as rigid as most expect.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Wellnoneedtowasteany: Well, no need to waste any time on pleasantries. I'll see you next loop, oh holy Father. Ooooh.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Weneedmoreessencetod: We need more essence to do that.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Whatisthisthinghangi: What is this thing hanging around my neck?
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Youarethepriestpadre: You are the priest, padre and patrón of that there burning establishment behind you.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Youregoingtofollowth: You’re going to follow that god damn witch in here. There are places of pure natural energy that she will want to visit.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_YouregoingtotheTowni: You’re going to the Town, in the shadow of Lucia’s castle. It’s a hard place to stay safe due to her masked guards patrolling the streets.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Yourestandingoutside: You’re standing outside of a cave. That cave leads to a portal, that in turn takes you to a dimensional state called Sulfur.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Yousawhowfastshewasf: You saw how fast she was flying right? She’s probably well on her way to the second one at this point. No matter, we’ll catch up. Don’t worry.
Dialog/Amulet_NPC_Youwontneedtouseitto: You won’t need to use it to teleport home right now, as that would be a bit of a waste.
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_Amatteroflifeandorde: A matter of life and/or death it is.
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_GetmeoutofherePronto: Get me out of here. Pronto! (Return to Church)
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_HoldonasecondYouwont: Hold on a second. You won't escape next time.
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_IhaventforgottenNowg: I haven't forgotten. Now, get out of my sight.
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_Isthereathirdusefort: Is there a third use for this or...?
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_NotsofastwhereistheW: Not so fast, where is the Witch?
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_OkIguessIbettergetgo: I heard everything I need to hear to motivate me.
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_RightButIneedtoaskyo: Right. But I need to ask you...
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_ShrinkDoyoumeanArthu: Shrink? Do you mean Arthur? What does he...
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_Soundsgoodtomeletspr: Sounds good to me, let's press on
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_Soundsimportantenoug: Sounds important enough to press on
Dialog/Amulet_PLA_Sparemethelecturewit: Spare me the lecture witch, I remember you. And your treachery.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_AgainIdonotknowPerha: Again, I do not know. Perhaps the shared trauma of us all perishing in such a small place has created an instant portal to the subconcious.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_ButIfeelthebestuseof: But I feel the best use of my time right now is to observe and research this here basement phenomenon.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Didyouactuallywantso: Did you actually want something? I'm in the middle of unraveling your psyche. Naturally, it would be easier to unravel if I could just drill a tiny small hole. I could use some stamps though if you have them.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Franklytherulesofthi: Frankly, the rules of this Sulfur realm perplexes me. We can't take anything for granted.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Icametoyourchurchlon: I came to your church long ago, after being persecuted for performing very crucial experiments that the government, and the public, didn't seem to take kindly too. I'll leave it at that.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Ifigurejumpinginhere: I figure jumping in here can get you to where you need to be a lot faster than chatting with me for hours about your... feelings.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Ihavedeductedthatiti: I have deducted that it is a matter of the mind, that much is clear...
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Ihavetoldyouallofthi: I have told you all of this many times. Perhaps a tiny lobotomy would jolt your memory? Or giving me some stamps.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Inthebasementyouwill: In the basement, you will face increasingly difficult traumas. Which may I remind you are entirely metaphysical.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_ItrytohelpoutwhereIc: I try to help out where I can, with matters of the mind.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Itseemstobeaverymuch: It seems to be a very much physical manifestation of a metaphysical concept.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Itseemstogetroundert: It seems to get rounder the less mental baggage you carry.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Itseemstomanifesttra: It seems to manifest trauma, that when dealt with seems to have very therapeutic effects. I wish I had something like this for when I had my practice.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Itwilltellyouaboutyo: It will tell you about your spiritual progress if you interact with it. Go ahead. Try. It's quite the intense sensation.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Laughterhealsthesoul: Laughter heals the soul, father. You should try it more often.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Losingyourselfinther: Losing yourself in there will have you start all over again should you try.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_NotmuchtotellImsurea: Not much to tell! I'm sure a lobotomy would calm the nerves. But I'll answer your questions the best I can.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_NotnowfatherImstillo: Not now father, I'm still on the cusp of figuring this all out. Unless there's a lobotomy you're looking for? Or want to trade some stamps.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Successfullyuntyingt: Successfully untying the knots of the subconcious also seems to make the soul cube here rounder and rounder.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Thatsagoodwayofdescr: That's a good way of describing that for sure. Don't mind if I steal that. Yes.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_ThatsprettymuchwhatI: That's pretty much what I've gathered. I'm currently dedicated to researching this rather than offering sessions.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Weallhaveapersonalon: We all have a personal one here in Sulfur, and it's only visible to it's owner.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_WellIpersonallycants: Well, I personally can't see it, so I'll just asume it's your soul cube. Atleast that's what I'll call it in my book.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Youcanseetheconditio: You can see the condition of your soul cube by examining its shape and its exhausts.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_Yourpietyisonlysurpa: Your piety is only surpassed by your memory, father. The name is Dr. Arthur Fritz. Pen name still pending.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_YouwillbehitbyWaveso: You will be hit by Waves of these projected emotions and will need to come to terms with them...
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_aboutlobotomiesIdoof: ... about lobotomies? I do offer those.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_andperiodiclygetrewa: ... and periodicly get rewarded for your struggles, so that you can continue further.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_aseveryonewhoenterst: ... as everyone who enters the basement here seems to enter more or less personal dream scapes.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_illseewhaticandofather: I'll see what I can do, Father. It will cost you though. Quid pro quo.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_ofcoursewecoulddo: Of course, we could do a little lobotomy to sweeten the deal. Or perhaps do some more stamp trading?
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_splendidgivemeasecond: Splendid, give me a second while I give the secret signal.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_therealldoneenjoyyour: There! All done. Enjoy your now cheaper services.
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_theyarealreadyatthe: They are already at the lowest possible price. Perhaps we should do a little lobotomy to see what's going on with your cognitive decline? Or trade some stamps?
Dialog/Arthur_NPC_youdonthaveenoughstamp: You don't have enough stamps for that.
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_Canyouexplainwhatyou: Can you explain what you know about this so far?
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_IgotstampsLetsseewha: I've got stamps. Let's see what you've got to trade for them.
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_Ihopewellfigureitout: I hope we'll figure it out soon enough...
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_SoundsabitscaryAnyth: Sounds a bit scary. Anything you can tell me to prepare me for this experience?
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_SoyouresayingIcangoi: So, you're saying I can go into there and literally fight my inner demons?
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_Whatsgoingonwiththat: What's going on with that basement... ?
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_canyouresetthecostofth: Can you reset the cost of the services that just keeps rising everytime I use them? It's getting out of hand.
Dialog/Arthur_PLA_whatsthatfloatycube: What's that floaty cube ghost thing?
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Aholymanofthecrossac: A holy man of the cross actually setting foot out here. But hey, given the nature of your position I’ll be seeing you a lot, as for when it comes to the actual passing, it’s probably not for the likes of you. No offense and all.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_AwitchNosorryMostpeo: A witch? No, sorry. Most people have no business here. Anything else?
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Billthelastnativeple: Bill, the last native, pleased to meet you. I’m probably the oldest living thing out here, except a few spirits I know.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Dontreallywanttotalk: Don’t really want to talk about what your cursed tower does to those. Sends chills all over my shell.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_DontworryaboutitHang: Don’t worry about it. Hanging out wasn’t really a part of our nature. We mostly stuck to ourselves, waved hi when passing and dug for Flat Sandfish. When the Hellshrew started showing up, there wasn’t enough to eat.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Dyingherewillhaveyou: Dying here will have you ending up in the void. Which is neither good nor bad in the most opposite way that the heavenly ocean is. The most secular ending imaginable.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Iguessthatsoneofthet: I guess that’s one of the things that resonates with you humans enough to run headfirst into it and bounce off over and over. Atonement, making things right, surrender, acceptance.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_IllbedamnedNowIvesee: I’ll be damned. Now I’ve seen it all.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Imsureyoulllearninti: I’m sure you’ll learn in time, there does seem to be a certain vibe about you. Besides, you’re here now, that alone makes you special.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_ItsthedesertUsedtobe: It’s the Desert. Used to be front row seats for spirits in their final sunset. Now It’s more of a minefield. Still, it’s the end of the line. If you’re not going “up there”.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Iuseittodigmybedever: I use it to dig my bed every night, and also to dig for Flat Sand Fish. Used to do it with my hands and face, but nicked this from one of the builders of the tower, and boy, does it help.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Mostcomeherereadylik: Most come here ready, like ethereal mists, just passing through until they get to the desert here, where they wander about and float on the winds until they become what we call “lost and found”, then I never see them again.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Mytribeiswasnativeto: My tribe is... was, native to the Sulfur desert, we’re not just passing by. We were always five, and while time can never kill us, violence can, and threats have come and gone and some... stayed. That and starvation made sure I’m the only one left.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Ofcoursedidntmeantos: Of course, didn't mean to scare you.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_PerhapsnotdirectlyLe: Perhaps not directly. Let’s just put it this way; you might have been a bit duped when it comes to where you’ve been putting your prayers.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Probablymorethanmost: Probably more than most, as I was actually born here. It’s the last slice of dimensional stop for anything with a soul, anywhere, until they drip into the ocean of the universe. Most are unknowingly eager to get out of here.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_TheHellshrewonlystar: The Hellshrew only started showing up a few thousand years ago. They don’t seem very interested in leaving.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Thisproblemandyouren: This problem, and your entire existence, is at all times an invisible cube in front of you. This cube will be a perfect sphere at the time this will be over for. It’s hard to turn a cube into a sphere with large tools, impatience and not giving it a good... finish. Hint, hint.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Timeandanyintentiono: Time and any intention of this demension and the ones before it needs to flow evenly across your entire being.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Wellforoneyouretorme: Well, for one, you’re tormenting spirits in a soul harvesting tower to the point that they become malevolent ghosts beyond saving, all to create an afterlife in your own image, that now controls you. Just another branch of the tree, forever and ever.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Whynotyourkindisextr: Why not, your kind is extremely rare around here, better take the time to talk.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_YourheavenpreacherIt: Your heaven, preacher. It’s on top of this all. If you intend to do anything but stay or turn back, that’s where you’ll end up.
Dialog/Bill_NPC_Youwhoenduphereinyou: You who end up here in your original form, have the longest way to go, and to be honest... in your cases? Even thinking about it is a step back. You’re going to have to survive here for a long time if you ever want to take that dip.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_AturtleinthedesertId: A turtle in the desert? I don’t have time for this.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Butthenwhatdowedo: But... then what do we do?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Goingthroughaminefie: Going through a minefield to get “up there” sounds good to me.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_HowaboutawitchSeenan: How about a witch? Seen any of those?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Idontrememberdoingan: I don’t remember doing any of that to be fair.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Igowheretheamulettel: I go where the amulet tells me, I have a job to do.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Ihappentobeknowlingl: I happen to be knowingly eager.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Illhavesomeofwhatyou: I’ll have some of what you’re having.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Illtakeyourwordforit: I’ll take your word for it. Let’s do some trading instead?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Imsorrytohearthatmus: I’m sorry to hear that, must be lonely.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Justshowmeyourwarest: Just show me your wares, tin-foil.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Letmebuysomeofyourst: Let me buy some of your stuff.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Letsgetbacktothenorm: Let’s get back to the normal questions.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_OhyeahNotsureImworth: Oh yeah? Not sure I’m worthy of such grace, let me ask you something else.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_OkIhaveheardofsomeof: Ok, I have heard of some of that talk. How do you actually get out?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Okletmelookatyourstu: Ok, let me look at your stuff!
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Perhapssometradingca: Perhaps some trading can lighten the mood?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_SoundslikeIshouldget: Sounds like I should get the hell out of here.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Specialenoughforadis: Special enough for a discount on your wares?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_SurviveWhathappensif: Survive? What happens if we die here?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_TenaciousbastardsLet: Tenacious bastards. Let me ask you something else.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Thatsoundshorriblele: That sounds horrible... let's back up one step here.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Thewondersofmodernte: The wonders of modern technology! But let me ask you...
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Thishurtsmyheadletme: This hurts my head, let me ask you something else.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_WhatdoyouknowaboutSu: What do you know about Sulfur?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Whatdoyoumeanthelast: What do you mean ‘the last’. Where are the others?
Dialog/Bill_PLA_Youbettergetonyourme: You better get on your meds, and I better get going.
Dialog/Bill_PLA_YouseemtoknowalotIha: You seem to know a lot, I have more questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_AboutSulfurThisrea: Texts about Sulfur. This reality we're in. Heaven. Big boy shit. It's all so very simple.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Acorruptedsoulofpu: A corrupted soul of pure innocense they say. Being pretty and pure was her "thing." Let's just say... now it's not, and she's gone mad.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_AhhahaRightyouareL: Ah, haha. Right you are. Lucia is the resident tyrant.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Alsoyoufitthedescr: Also you fit the description of a person in a few prophecies I've read. Which means you should probably get out of my sight and fulfil some of those.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Apriestwithgunsand: "A priest with guns and a strange looking amulet is going to leave a trail of corpses around like a homicidal maniac, in the name of vengeance."
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Falseworshipisforf: False worship is for fools like you. Now vanish from my periphery!
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Hell-bentonletting: Hell-bent on letting anyone with an even remotely presentable face cover up, or face her wrath.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_HowconvenientTheny: How convenient! Then you know what you must do.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ITDOESNOTGETOUTOFM: IT DOES NOT. GET OUT OF MY SIGHT!
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ITSCALLEDHAIRWHATS: IT'S CALLED HAIR! WHAT'S THE PROBLEM?
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_IWILLNOTBEREDUCEDT: I WILL NOT BE REDUCED TO THE COLOR OF MY HAIR.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Iamnottobedisturbe: I am not to be disturbed, yet you are disturbing. So, if you could just remove yourself from the conversation, literally?
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Icouldsmellyourfai: I could smell your faith from a mile away, and it's distracting enough as it is without your mouth breathing.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Ihaveinnoshapeorfo: I have in no ambition to spend thousands of years self-improving to ascend. Which means I'm staying here.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ImRexmagusofthehig: I'm Rex, magus of the highest order. I have political immunity and a mission of the greatest importance that is of no concern of yours. Now leave me be.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ImascholarMycolors: I'm a scholar. My views don't align with those of the Guild, however being in their ranks allows me access to St. Lucia's Library, the most extensive archive in all of Sulfur.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ImcreatingthePhilo: I'm creating the "Philosopher's stone", and will offer quick and real salvation. To the highest bidder of course. I will rule this realm!
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Imlookingintothefu: I'm looking into the function and hard physics about this here domain, as it's pretty obvious that being here at all is due to mechanical corruption.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Immainlytryingtofi: I'm mainly trying to finish up here and get out as it's becoming increasingly risky.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Imtryingtofigureou: I'm trying to figure out the real reality of things, and do you know what the reality of things is... at this very moment?
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Isupposeyoureheref: I suppose you're here for Lucia anyway. That part of the prophecy is aligned with my fortune.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Ithinkwegotoffonex: I think we got off on exactly the foot I was aiming for to be fair. Make it quick.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Itwasinfinitelymor: It was infinitely more words than I wanted to spend on you.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Muchtothedismayofe: Much to the dismay of everyone but the highest order of the Black Guild and the cause they serve.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Myresearchbenefits: My research benefits all. No one touches me. Why wouldn't I have my back turned, at all times? Usually it helps people get the picture.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Myrobesdontmeanwha: My robes don't mean what you think they mean, charlatan. Leave me to my research.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_OhImgladyouaskedIt: Oh, I'm glad you asked. It's one star for each of the words in: GO. AWAY. I'M BUSY.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Sheholdsextremepow: She holds extreme power, that can now put to use for questionable things. How convenient for some that her demeanor changed.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_SoinrealityIdaskyo: So in reality I'd ask you to fuck off in the same direction from whence you came, but I know you won't do that so I'm not going to bother.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ThatIwantyoutoleav: That I want you to leave me the sulf ALONE! Take a god damn hint, worshiper.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_ThatsthesampleTher: That's the sample. The rest costs more than you will ever have, and would have me conversing for far longer than I would like. Now, please leave.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Thatswhatallthehom: That's what all the homicidal priests with amulets say. No more questions!
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Thatyouaremakingth: That you are making that extremely difficult by not getting out of my sight and shutting your trap!
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Theflocklivesandvi: The flock lives and view the world with a corrupt set of spectacles. All thanks to people like you.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Theplanwastosellmy: The plan was to sell my research to her, but I fear her state is far beyond negotiation about any reward.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Yeseventhesecultis: Yes, even these cultist assholes. They may be murderous and heartless, but I don't bother myself with questions regarding morality.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Youllfindoutsoonen: You'll find out soon enough. And I'm done talking to you.
Dialog/BlondMagus_NPC_Youshowingupshorte: Your showing up shortens my timeline, it's a bit stressful, so might I ask you nicely to... PISS OFF!
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_CoolGotanyscrollsa: Cool, got any scrolls and stuff to sell then?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Didthepropheciesal: Did the prophecies also tell you that I'm merely defending myself?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestf: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Foolishwouldbetotu: Foolish would be to turn your back, in a place like this.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Forabusyblondmagey: For a busy blond mage, you sure have a lot to say.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_GeezGeezRelaxLetme: Geez! Geez! Relax! Let me just browse your stuff and I'll be on my way.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Guesssomeonewokeup: Guess someone woke up on the wrong side of the bed...
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_HelloOhwellguessth: Hello? Oh, well... guess that's my cue.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Heynowletsrelaxwit: Hey now, let's relax with a few other questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Idontwanttotalktoy: I don't want to talk to you anymore anyway.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Iguessthatreaction: I guess that answer was to be expected.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Ihopeyourdiscounts: I hope your discounts are as mega as your ego!
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Ihopeyourenotjusts: I hope you're not just selling pictures, because I'd like something else...
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Illletthemoneytalk: I'll let the money talk then.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Imnothereforanyone: I'm not here for anyone but the witch. Who's Lucia?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_IrememberIlefttheo: I remember I left the oven on!
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_IthinkIshouldgosee: I think I should go see her.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Ithinkperhapsjusta: I think perhaps just a few more questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Ithinkwegotoffonth: I think we got off on the wrong foot. Let's start over.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Iwillifyoujustansw: I will if you just answer me this...
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Iwillifyourewillin: I will, if you're willing to let me browse your wares.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Justonetinyteenyqu: Just one tiny teeny question more, sir.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Letsseeifyoureabet: Let's see if you're a better trader than a linguist.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Mybadobviouslyasor: My bad, obviously a sore subject. Let's get back to the important questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_NoImeantheyellowst: No, I mean the yellow stuff.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_NotsofastLetstrade: Not so fast. Let's trade first.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_ShutupMyactionshav: Shut up! My actions have consequences and free will is real!
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Thatsoundslikerese: That sounds like research that requires you to focus in solitude.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Thenwhyareyoustill: That explains why you're still alive, with your face.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_ThethreestarsThecu: The three stars? The cultist colors?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Whatmaterialareyou: What material are you looking for?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Whydidntyoujustsay: Why didn't you just say so?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Whydoesyournametag: Why does your name tag say Blond Magus then... ?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_WoahCalmdownJustaf: Woah! Calm down. Just a few more questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Wowthistookabitofa: Wow, this took a bit of a turn don't you think?
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_YeahIneedtostoplet: Yeah, I need to stop letting you waste my time.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_YesLetmebuysomethi: Yes. Let me buy something and I'll be on my way.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_YesabsolutelyWhich: Yes, absolutely. Which is why I only have a very few amount of other questions.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_YikesToomuchsassfo: Yikes! Too much sass for me.
Dialog/BlondMagus_PLA_Youseemtowearingal: You seem to be wearing a lot more "cloth" than me, to be fair.
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_NPC_Atrialofenduranc: A trial of endurance. You will have to battle your demons for a duration of time. Then you will be presented with your reward.
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_NPC_AtrialoffindingY: A trial of finding. You will have to find a number of impurities and weed them out within an amount of time. Then you will receive your reward.
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_NPC_Atrialofovercomi: A trial of overcoming. You will have to defeat specific demons. Then you will receive your reward.
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_NPC_Atrialoftheprote: A trial of the protector. You will have to defend your soul against demons for a duration of time. Then you will receive your reward.
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_NPC_HumanAreyouheref: Human. Are you here for the trial of the spirit?
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_PLA_Notatthistimeotu: Not at this time, o... turtle statue?
Dialog/CryptTurtle2_PLA_OoopswronghouseI: Ooops, wrong house, I'll be on my way!
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_AnywayWantToRes: Anyway... want to restock the vendors?
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_DoYouWantToReSt: Do you want to restock the vendors or not?
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_WantMeToReStock: Want me to restock all the vendors?
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_YoDhellAtYourSe: Yo. DHell, at your service. Stiffleg called in a favor.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_hahajustkidding: Haha! Just kidding... But actually not.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_icantdiscloseth: I can't disclose that due to my NDA. But I can tell you this...
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_idefinitelydidn: I definitely did not say that.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_ihaveonedreamin: I have one dream in my little demon life, and that is to go out there and do... anything else than working at DHell.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_ivenowrestocked: I've now restocked them all. Happy shopping, preacher.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_ohthatwellikill: Oh that. Well, I killed him sort of. So helping you guys out is the least I could do.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_soyouguessediti: So, you guessed it. I'm "the connect". Better keep your trap shut about it though, or you know what will happen.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_NPC_youneedsomemore: You need some more scratch for that, old man.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_PLA_imgoodfornowdel: I'm good for now, Delivery Demon.
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_PLA_soundslikeyoudo: Sounds like you don't like it?
Dialog/DeliveryDemon_PLA_sureilltakeares: Sure, I'll take a restock of the vendors.
Dialog/DesertClauseAirstrike_NPC_AlsoIfI: Also. If I as much as smell an Elf search party I'll skin you alive. Max was it? Remember who sees you when you're sleeping!
Dialog/DesertClauseAirstrike_NPC_Headqua: Headquarters! Fire the rockets! On my position! NOW!
Dialog/DesertClauseAirstrike_NPC_Neveryo: Never you mind where I've been you little Elf prick! I'm still your boss!
Dialog/DesertClauseAirstrike_NPC_Nowfire: Now fire the god damn rockets on my coordinates!
Dialog/DesertClauseAirstrike_NPC_Whatdoy: What do you mean "who is this", who the hell do you think it is?
Dialog/DesertClauseIntro_NPC_Howthehelld: How the hell did you find me here?!
Dialog/DesertClauseIntro_PLA_Imactuallyn: I’m actually not even looking for you, I’m-
Dialog/DesertClauseIntro_PLA_Ithinkyoure: I think you’re missing out on a really good pun with your new name.
Dialog/DesertClauseIntro_PLA_Whatthehell: What the hell is going on here... ?
Dialog/DesertClauseTerminator_NPC_Wellch: Well christ, I guess there's no turning back now. We're going to have to end this, one way or another.
Dialog/DesertClauseTerminator_NPC_Youwer: You... weren't even here to find me were you?
Dialog/DesertClauseTerminator_PLA_Canyou: Can you just let me say one thi-!
Dialog/DesertClauseToSniper_NPC_IguessIm: I guess I'm going to have to take care of your naughty ass myself!
Dialog/EmperorPhase2_NPC_Thesehallswillb: These halls will be your tomb!
Dialog/EmperorPhase2_NPC_Thetimefortalki: The time for talking is over!
Dialog/EmperorPhase2_PLA_Howthehelldidyo: How the hell did you anticipate... this?
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_AnassassinfromtheBl2: An assassin from the Black Guild, envoy of Lucia we imagine. Believers of a literally artificial heaven.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_AnassassinfromtheBla: An assassin from the Black Guild, envoy of Lucia we imagine.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Ha-haDontmakemelaugh: Ha-ha. Don't make me laugh. I've taken some pointers from your overlords. I'm more than prepared for you.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Hehasbroughtbacktheh: He has brought back the holy order to a decadent, indecent and aimless society.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_HismostholyEmperorBo: "His most holy Emperor"! Born again into Sulfur, from the Shav'Wa Gardens of myth. First in a thousand generations!
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_OfcourseyouareYouhav: Of course you are. You have been expected.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_OhreallyAnywayIcanta: Oh, really? Anyway, I can't allow you to leave. I've said too much.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Sosimpleandelegantit: So simple and elegant it's almost unbelievable. It's been very, very inspirational.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_SoyousayBewarnedIhav: So you say. Be warned, I have prepared most dilligently for this encounter.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_SuchagulliblepigAnyw: Such a gullible pig. Anyway, I will not let you leave, no one will hear of what you know. This is the end.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Supposewhatyousayist: Suppose, what you say is true...  even though all evidence points to the contrary.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Thestoryaboutrebirth: The story about rebirth, everlasting life? It's the perfect opium for our most basic fears. Most of the poeple swallow it whole.
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Thewayyoudeceivethep: The way you deceive the people...
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Whatareyouactuallydo: What are you actually doing here?
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Whodaresenterthecham: Who dares enter the chambers of  "His most holy Emperor"?
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Youdohavethatgoingfo: You do have that going for you, I'll give you that. My afterlife is imaginary, yours is fake and artificial. Don't tell me you didn't know?
Dialog/Emperor_NPC_Youdontlikecompetiti: You don't like competition, so now you're here. I'm surprised you got this far with all the measures taken. With only soldiers on the streets as well as day and night curfew.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_ArtificialNowthatsbl: Artificial? Now that's blasphemy. You'll pay for that.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_FromwhatIvebeenheari: From what I've been hearing, he is a charlatan, using false religion to control the people..
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Ihavenoideawhatyoure: I have no idea what you're talking about. But I've heard enough.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Imheretofreeyourpeop: I'm here to free your people. Viva la resistance!
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Imonaquesttoredeemmy: I'm on a quest to redeem my flock from everlasting damnation. This involves finding a certain amount of magical shrines tied to the earth mother.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_IshethetyrantIvebeen: Is he the tyrant I've been hearing about?
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Justapriestonapilgri: Just a priest, on a pilgrimage. To do good by my people.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_ThatsniceWellIvealre: That's nice. Well, I've already found what I was looking for in that shrine on the last level, so any further talking is unnecessary. You can come out of that fourth wall now.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Theresonlyroomforone: There's only room for one belief system in Sulfur.
Dialog/Emperor_PLA_Youddowellnottobunch: You'd do well not to bunch me up with those Black Guild lunatics.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_AhlookatthetimeSessi: Ah, look at the time. Session's over. Need to buy anything?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Ahmycondolencesandwe: Ah, my condolences, and welcome to Sulfur to you and yours. It's a bit rigid and stiff here for most of us comparatively to heaven.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Ahtheoverallprophecy: Ah, the overall "prophecy." Look, buy something, right? I have much work to do.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Andhowdoesthatmakeyo: And how does that make you feel?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_ExactlyBreakingitdow: Exactly. "Breaking it down like that" is also sort of the message there.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_ForyourquestionIknow: For your question, I know of only one witch still left in Sulfur and the wind rarely speaks of it.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_GladtohelpImsuresome: Glad to help. I'm sure some of my scrolls may be able to help you along the way.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Havingmetalkwasnoton: Having me talk was not one of the options.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Illbesomewherewhenyo: I'll be somewhere when you do.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Itdoesnotmeanthesame: It does not mean the same for you as it does for me.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Ithoughttheideawasth: I thought the idea was that I should listen, not speak. But all right, I'll say this: A path is formed by laying one stone at a time.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Ithoughtyoumightfrie: I thought you might, friend. Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Itsthewordtheairbrea: It's the word the air breathes, the leaves shake and the fires burn. It's all around us everywhere, you hear it all the time, but few people actually listen.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Iusuallydontspeaksob: I usually don't speak so bluntly, but I do need to concentrate on listening, writing or selling you scrolls of magic empowerment. You get to pick one of those.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Iwillassumeyourenota: I will assume you're not asking if I am one, that would be extremely rude.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Justmakingconversati: Just making conversation. If you could leave me to my work now that would be best.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_MynameisFexShuenIama: My name is Fex Shuen. I am a disciple of the word.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Nothingisinherentlyg: Nothing is inherently good or evil.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_PatienceisavirtueSow: Patience is a virtue. So, what's the topic, priest? Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Perhapsitsyouthathav: Perhaps it's you that have information for me?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Placeonepieceatatime: Place one piece at a time rather than try to solve the entire puzzle by putting all the pieces in a pile and smashing them with a hammer.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_SaganatbelieverHaven: Saga'naté, believer. Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_SorryaboutthatYoudid: Sorry about that. You did ask. What else do you need? Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Sowhatsbeengoingonwi: So, what's been going on with you lately?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Sureorthefrictionles: Sure, or the frictionless bow on the strings of the cosmic web. Whatever floats your boat.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Thankyouforyourcontr: Thank you for your contribution. Anything else? Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Thataimlessnesscanle: That aimlessness can lead to anxiousness and inactivity, set small targets that are more in the now.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Thatisverypowerfulma: That is very powerful magic indeed... I'd talk longer, but I have much work to do.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Thatsnotnecessarilyw: That's not necessarily what I meant, but...
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Theresnothingreallym: There's really nothing more to say about it. Unless you mean "who I am" metaphysically, and then we could stand here for hours.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Thestrongerthemanife: The stronger the manifestation, the more it echoes in infinity... which of course affects the price.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Weregoodsamaritansno: We're good samaritans, not free samaritans. Even the Shuen need to eat.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Wewriteitdowninterpr: We write it down, interpret, and remember. So that it can manifest once again.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Whatastrangeartifact: What a strange artifact... I can imbue it, for a price. 1000 SULF.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_WhatsonyourmindHaven: What's on your mind? Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Wherewellendupifwere: Where we'll end up if we're abruptly separated from your body in this here realm. It's literally... nothing.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Witchesareofthesoilw: Witches are of the soil, we are of the air. We can not be more different.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Wouldyoulikethingsto: Would you like things to be different?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_YesButIwillnottalkmo: Yes. But I will not talk more about this due to security reasons. We're extremely uninterested in ending up in the Infinite Void™.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_Youdohavetherighttod: You do have the right to defend yourself, even by karmic standards.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_reallyAndhowmanytime: ... really? And how many times... do you think you've come back?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_unlessweendupintheIn: ... unless we end up in the Infinite Void™ of course. Which, from your attire and current location looks like a very real posibility.
Dialog/Fex_NPC_yesHaveneedofthemagi: ... yes? Have need of the magic word?
Dialog/Fex_NPC_yourstrangeartifactalread: Your strange artifact already radiates full power.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_AhrightThatmakessens: Ah, right! That makes sense when you break it down like that.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Awitchburntdownmychu: A witch burnt down my church, killed all of my congregation. I'm trying to find her.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Canyouempowermyamule: Can you empower my amulet so I can go back?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_FairenoughIhaveother: Fair enough. I have other questions.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Forbeingadescipleoft: For being a desciple of the word you're not very descriptive.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_HahAlreadygotallthew: Hah! Already got all the words I need for free.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_HeavenYoudontstrikem: Heaven? You don't strike me as a believer.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_HehatthispointIguess: Heh... at this point I guess it's doing anything necessary to get the job done, including killing and stealing along the way.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_HellyeahdudeButwhata: Hell yeah dude. But what about...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_HowcouldInotbuysomet: How could I not buy something from someone so wise.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Icanfillitupforfreei: I can fill it up for free if I move at a steady pace...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Idonthavethatkindofm: I don't have that kind of money right now.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Idonthavetimeforridd: I don't have time for riddles.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Ifeelmuchbetteryouta: I feel much better, you taught me that there -is- in fact a choice, and I'm not a slave to fate. Thank you!
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IgettopickOhboyOhboy: I get to pick... ? Oh boy! Oh boy!
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IguessIwouldbutIamon: I guess I would, but I am on a mission in the god damn... alternative underworld... of sorts. I feel that I am somewhat excused.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IguessnothingreallyO: ... I guess nothing really. Oh no.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IguessyourerightThan: I guess you're right. Thank you.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Ihaveafewmorequestio: I have a few more questions.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IhavenoideaCountless: I have no idea. Countless. I think it's beginning to mess with my memory.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Ijustdontunderstandw: I just don't understand what my motivations here are. Am I losing faith? Am I just lazy? Am I doing any good, or am I bad?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Imayhavesomemoneyfor: I may have some money for you, if you show me your wares.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Imeantlistentothewin: I meant, listen to the wind and shit like that. I'll leave you to it.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_ImnotafaneitherLetsn: I'm not a fan either. Let's not jinx it.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Imnotafuckingyardcar: I'm not a fucking yard carpenter... what's that supposed to mean?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Imnotsurealottoconte: I'm not sure... a lot to contemplate.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Informationisinshort: Information is in short supply I'm afraid. Which is why I have more questions.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Ipickthatyoushouldgo: I pick that you should go back to writing.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Ipiiickbuyscrollsofm: I piiick... buy scrolls of magic empowerment!
Dialog/Fex_PLA_IrespectthatLetstalk: I respect that. Let's talk about something else.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Letsbridgethegapwith: Let's bridge the gap with some trading!
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Letsgobacktothegener: Let's go back to the general questions please...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Letsjustagreetodisag: Let's just agree to disagree then I guess.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Letsnotgodownthispat: Let's not go down this path.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_NotsureWhyareyouaski: Not sure. Why are you asking?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_OhyeahGuessIbettersp: Oh yeah? Guess I better spend my money now then.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_OnsecondthroughLetsg: On second thought. Let's get back to some questions.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_RightPerhapsmycongre: Right? Perhaps my congregation are better off where they're at and I can just chill out. Perhaps I can even get back to living, I mean... I didn't even die.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_RightThanksmanfeelsa: Right? Thanks man, feels a lot better.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_RightrightmybadCanIc: Right, right, my bad. Can I choose again?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Sincethenitsjustbeen: Since then it's just been a murderous rampage and mushroom picking and... man, it's a lot to take in now that I'm actually hearing myself saying it, you know?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_ThatssuperscaryLetsg: That's super scary. Let's get back to the not so scary questions.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Thenwhatfreakingooda: Then what freakin' good are ya!?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Thenwhatwouldyouhave: Then what would you have me do?
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Thestrangethingistha: The strange thing is that I'm totally enjoying the experience so far...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Thisamuletletsmecome: This amulet lets me come back. We are unified in destiny.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Wastingmytimewiththi: Wasting my time with this hippie shit...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Whataomniousthingtos: What a ominous thing to say...
Dialog/Fex_PLA_WheretobeginfirstIcr: Where to begin... first I crash into a tree, I don't remember much after that, but my amulet reminds me that my church was just under attack and everyone burned inside. It was the witch! She's burning going into a cave entrance and the amulet is like "you need to follow her into some sort of waiting room afterlife dimension and find a bunch of shit." And I'm just so stressed about the whole thing.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Whydidntyoujustsayso: Why didn't you just say so? Let me buy some scrolls.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_YeahmanWereallinit: Yeah man. We're all in it.
Dialog/Fex_PLA_Yourefreetobelievewh: You're free to believe whatever you want, we're all children of God in the end.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_AaaahFoodtalktoo: Aaaah! Food talk too much, jump in mouth. I chew fast.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_Cavesnotenoughfo: Caves not enough food, other cousins draw straws.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_Fellintobloodyma: Fell into bloody magic shrine as a young. Now biggest of all Goblin. I hear even biggest in Gabba.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_HEHEandtheygivei: Hehe... and they give it alive for sport.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_HaaeeuhHue-haIam: Haaeeuh! Hue-ha! I am just one big cousin.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_Hehe-ahahuhNotso: Hehe-ahahuh! Not so fast soft man. You pulling my small arm!
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_HueahyeshJuicywi: Hueah, yesh! Juicy with the skin that goes SNAP!
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_IwouldthankSkwee: I would thank Skweer for this gift, if he not next on list to get EAT!
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_OhmistakehappenI: Oh, mistake happen. I will tell to open gate.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_WuaahasoftMustbe: Wuaah, a soft! Must be Cousin's birthday.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_YouareasoftIalso: You are a soft. I also attack you.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_Youarefoodaftera: You are food after all. Not accident.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_NPC_orImightgethungr: ... or I might get hungry and die.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Buttheywilldiewh: But they will die when you eat them, how is that fair?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Dontworryyourhun: Don't worry, your hunger is about to end.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Fairpointletsget: Fair point... let's get this over with.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Howdidyougetsobi: How did you get so big?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Iguesssometimesi: I guess sometimes it's just straight forward like that.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Iguessthatsfairl: I guess that's fair logic in a Goblin sort of way.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Ihopethatsmudyou: I... hope that's mud you're sitting in.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Iwillasknofurthe: I will ask no further questions.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_NodummyImeanwhya: No dummy I mean, why are all you goblin cousins attacking me?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_OhyousaidCousinI: Oh, you said Cousin? I was looking for Casey. Easy mistake, sorry. Got to run!
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Oneofyourarmsiss: One of your arms is still small.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Peculiarasyouren: Peculiar, as you're next on my list.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_RightokthenYouwe: Right, ok then. You were about to eat me?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_SoifIwastorunawa: So, if I was to run away, you wouldn't be able to follow me?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_ThatstragicIllpu: That's tragic. I'll put you out of your misery.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Wellletsseeifwec: Well, let's see if we can cut you down to size.
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Whyareyouallatta: Why are you all attacking me?
Dialog/GoblinCousin_PLA_Youreabouttobeze: You're about to be zero big cousins.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_ActuallyIwouldbut: Actually, I would... but my smoking habit is burdening my economy a bit, so it’d cost you 1000 coins. I’m sure you understand.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_AlrightIhavesomes: Alright... I have some... stuff to do. We'll talk later.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_COUGHPureSulfurIt: (Cough) Pure Sulfur. It’s a nasty habit, but let me tell you... It’s a hell of a lot easier to come by in a placed named after it, that’s for sure. Hot commodity, but also not very cheap. Heh!
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_CoughRememberthou: (Cough) Remember though that it's empty now. Gotta fill that sucker up again.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Doorsalwaysbeenop: Door’s always been open to anyone, regardless of their past, hence why the majority of us here seem to be... let’s call it “innocence impaired”, hehe.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_HahCOUGHTheonlyre: Hah! (Cough) The only reason anything would be new around here would be you doing some crazy heroic deed out there, and me not having to dig you up over and over.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_HahNotfromthegrav: Hah! Not from the grave this time eh? (Cough) Bless the Lord.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_HahagoodoneIguess: Haha, good one! I guess you got banged up pretty good.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Hopeyoustashedsom: Hope you stashed some of your stuff this time. Oh, and check the collection post box.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Howsitgoingyoungn: How’s it going young’n? Hue-hue-hue. (Cough) Hell treating you well?
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Hue-hue-hueGuessI: Hue-hue-hue. Guess I’ll humor you again. You are the person who took care of us all, well... the ones that have made it back here since crossing over.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Iftheotherswerent: If the others weren’t lost somewhere out there, there’d be plenty more to do, items to buy etc.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_ImonlyknownastheG: I’m only known as the Gravedigger, interestingly enough I was a mute back in the real world. I did what my name suggests and kept my mouth shut. Hue-hue-hue.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Itcanalsobepartia: It can also be partially refilled. So beware that you might have a bit of juice in there at certains points, but not enough to teleport.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Kindofmissingitth: Kind of missing those silent days as people actually expect me to answer their dumb questions now. (Cough)
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_NghAhHahTherewego: Ngh... Ah! Hah! There we go, all yours. Hue-hue-hue.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Nobleideaofcourse: Noble idea of course, lord know’s we’re all better for it, shame it was also this idea that doomed us. (Cough)
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Nothingsfreeinlif: Nothing's free in life, you know that. Hueh.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_OkayherewegoWould: Okay, here we go. Would you look away for a second? Hrmph... (Cough)
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Suretheresseveral: Sure, there's several ways. Charges can be found, and bought as well as refilled at shrines.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Thankheckthatamul: Thank heck that amulet you got keep givin’ you extra chances, or we’d be stuck here forever, no offense of course.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_ThanksforplayingY: Thanks for playing. You have completed the currently available areas. You can keep playing an revisit previous areas, there's probably a lot more to discover and test. Please join our Discord and tell us what you thought!
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Thehumblesaloonsw: The humble saloon doors symbolizes this; anyone is welcome here.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_ThereyouareHue-hu: There you are! Hue-hue-hue. (Cough) Seeing you pop out of there never gets old.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Thisherechurchisc: This here church is called ‘The Original Sin’, as a reminder that we’re all sinners.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Ungh-hahNotahallu: Ungh-hah! Not a hallucination this time either. That amulet sure is a blessing.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Wellouropendoorpo: Well, our “open door” policy seemed to have attracted some unwanted attention from a particularly evil witch, who infiltrated and pretty much killed all of us... except you, but hey; you’re here now anyway. Which is nice, place wouldn’t be the same without you.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Wereallhopingtomo: We’re all hoping to move on into the next life at some point.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Wereextremelygrat: We’re extremely grateful for your patronage, both then, and here now in whatever you would call this bullshit afterlife.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Wevebeencursedtos: We’ve been cursed to stay here. One could say being in Sulfur is a curse within itself, but these evil barriers are stopping us from going anywhere, or doing anything about it.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Whenwenoticedthec: When we noticed the curse was lifted over at the Town even I felt a hint of hope in my cold old heart. Hue-hue-hue. The others are nothing short of ecstatic.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Youcanalsogobackt: You can also go back to any area you’ve previously been. Just follow the paths.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Youcanrepairyours: You can repair your stuff at Ralphie’s outside of the church. Brilliant mechanic that one.
Dialog/GraveDigger_NPC_Youcanstoreitemsm: You can store items, money and ammo in the stash chests. They're all linked up.
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuest: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_Isthereawayexcept: Is there a way except shrines to refill the amulet?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_LateroldpalGottak: Later, old pal. Gotta keep moving.
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_MineisntfullCanyo: Mine isn't full... Can you refill it?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_RightWhataboutthi: Right. What about this dark matter... with the eyes?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_WaitwhatWhatisthi: Wait, what? What is this place?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_Whatthehellisthat: What the hell is that you’re smoking... ?
Dialog/GraveDigger_PLA_Youwouldntbeablet: You wouldn’t be able to charge my amulet, would you?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_AmanofyourtasteAskaw: A man of your taste? Ask away.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Apparentlytheyscrape: Apparently they scrape away their sins with special devices.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_AslongasivebeeninSul: As long as I've been in Sulfur and more, but the activity has ramped up recently.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_AsyoucanseeIdontsell: As you can see I don't sell a lot of meat because not very many animals cross over into Sulfur for some reason.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_AtthisrateImnotsuret: At this rate I'm not sure the herd...
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Besidesnineoutofteno: Besides, nine out of ten of my sales go to guild related personnel. Give or take.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Besidesthepeopleneed: Besides, the people need to eat! I'm just doing my part.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_BishopsandStLucyclea: Bishops and St. Lucy are cleaning house, lot's of sinners down here apparently.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_DoIlikeitNoitsjustth: Do I like it? No, it's just the way of the world now.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_GrossbergsMostsecret: Grossberg's. Most secret ingredients in town. What'll ye have?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_HahGrossbergsinthena: Hah! Grossberg's in the name isn't it? Wholesaler and butcher by trade.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_HellIdontknowImnotab: Hell, I don't know. I'm not a bloody... animal philosopher. Looking to buy something or just flapping gums?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Iguesstheresalotofun: I guess there's a lot of unnatural predators keeping the numbers down?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Ihavehelpedoutafewti: I have helped out a few times, out of the goodness of my heart.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_ImakeduewithwhatIfin: I make due with... what I find.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Imsuretheresalawagai: I'm sure there's a law against discrimination like that. (Hock a loogie)
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Interestedinseeingth: Interested in seeing the special section?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Justagoodsloganjusts: Just a good slogan, just so you know you're getting the best of the best!
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Notverylongaspotopen: Not very long, a spot opened up so to speak.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_OhIdefinitelywillDef: Oh, I definitely will. Definitely. Just have some services to provide first.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Ohjustsomecarbonemis: Oh... just some... carbon emission stuff. Don't worry about it all right?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Perhapstheyrenotsinf: Perhaps they're not sinful enough, or a lot of them don't have souls.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Perhapstheyrespecial: Perhaps they're special? Look I'm not an expert. I just cut them up.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_PointisfairIllgiveyo: Point is fair. I'll give you a really good price if you come across some.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Sellingeverydaygoods: Selling everyday goods, crafting materials and cooked meats. That should sum it up for ya.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Somedontmakeitthroug: Some don't make it through the process... but what is eternity in Sulfur compared to a place in Heaven?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_WellIpayforprotectio: Well, I pay for protection, give generous discounts, run my mouth, among other things.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_WellisntitSecretsauc: Well, isn't it? Secret sauce? Secret recipes? Everyone wants those.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_WhatcanIdoyefor: What can I do ye for?
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_WhileIwashesitantatf: While I was hesitant at first, I figured it was worth giving it as shot due to the current lax in taxation and regulation.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Wouldberudenottowoul: Would be rude not to, wouldn't it? They've done me nothing wrong, personally.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Yeahmonstrousiswhati: Yeah, monstrous is what it is.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Yeahsadlyitbreaksmyh: Yeah sadly it breaks my heart as well as my wallet. But I'll manage. I'm not the type of person to put my all my eggs in one basket.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_YoudbesurprisedPeopl: You'd be surprised. People still need to eat, soldiers and townfolk alike.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_Youhaveapointtherest: You have a point there, stranger. Not sure dolphin meat is in big demand.
Dialog/Grocer_NPC_YouknowwhatsirYousou: You know what, sir? You sound like someone who would appreciate something a bit more exotic.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_BlankstareLetsnotget: (Blank stare) ... Let's not get into that.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_DontsaythatIdlovetob: Don't say that. I'd love to bite into some raw dolphin given the chance. I bet you could almost taste the IQ.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_FairpointLetsseewhat: Fair point. Let's see what you got.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Ihaveseensomeanimals: I have seen some animals... ? Chicken, the rare snail...
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Illheadofandfindsome: I'll head off and find some right away.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Imjustpassingthrough: I'm just passing through. Better leave the wares to the needy.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Imsurethatwouldtakea: I'm sure that would take a toll on sales.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Notrightnowgotafewqu: Not right now, got a few questions.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Salesmustbeprettybad: Sales must be pretty bad with what's going on here?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Seemsabitconvolutedf: Seems a bit convoluted for no reason but fair enough.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Theresadifferencethe: There's a difference there; serving violent oppression and  feeding the everyday man?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_WhataboutdolphinsThe: What about dolphins? There's some disturbing facts about those.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Whatregulationsareyo: What regulations are you in need of bypassing?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Whatthehellisgoingon: What the hell is going on in this town?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Wheredoyoufindthemea: Where do you find the meats?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Whyhaventyourstorebe: Why haven't you been killed, and your store raided?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Yeahnotgoingtotalkab: Yeah, not going to talk about it here, but if this whole passing over thing works the way I understood it there should just be mountains of dolphins laying around.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_YougotitButfornowImh: You got it. But for now, I'm here on other business.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_YoulackvisionImwasti: You lack vision, I'm wasting my time.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_YourerightShouldntbe: You're right. Shouldn't be eating stuff like that.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Yoursainthoodwillgod: Your sainthood will go down in history. Bless you.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Youseemabitdirtyinev: You seem a bit dirty in every sense of the word.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_Youtakewhatyougetrig: You take what you get, right? Besides, they would be incredibly rare, there's always the market for that.
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_andwhatwouldstopthef: ... and what would stop the few ones that do cross over to breed more?
Dialog/Grocer_PLA_whatScrewthisJustope: ... what? Screw this. Just open the damn vendor window.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Icantfathomw: I can't fathom why corporate thought we needed to expand in the Caves of all places.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Ididntwritet: I didn't write that rule, just so you know.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Iguessthatsw: I guess that's what you get when you ship with that demon delivery company.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_ImeanHelloIm: I mean... Hello! I'm from the Haukland Company. We make the finest firearms and accessories for said firearms. Come! Have a gander!
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_ImeanehGreat: I mean, eh... Great! Here's your card...
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Itsbeenawhil: It's been a while since anyone showed any interest. Let me check my notes...
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_ItsnotbadThe: It's not bad! The short guy is a bit weird, but he keeps to himself.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Itsnotgreatt: It's not great, to be honest. It's cold as hell and the Goblins aren't very friendly. Also, they don't seem to understand the concept of neither gun or coin.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Morespecific: More specifically you need to give me 2 eyes.... from a dog... Or from several dogs... that seems to be allowed as well.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Notallofourp: Not all of our policies are weird like that, by the way.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Nowareyougon: Now, are you gonna to buy a gun?
Now, are you gonna to buy something? Maybe some other customer policies you're interested in, mr big deal?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Nowthatwered: Now that we're done with that disgusting transaction, do you want to buy anything today?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_OhIwassuppos: Oh... I was supposed to receive a kit to build a proper Haukland Depot. It's been days but it hasn't arrived! I've been using my off hours to set this up, thank you very much.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Onlyavailabl: Only available to members, I'm afraid.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_ThankyouIllg: Thank you! I'll get going right away!
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_UghAreyougoi: Ugh... Are you going to buy a gun, or what?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_UhmVerywellw: Uhm... Very well, what's on your mind?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Welcomeestee: Welcome esteemed member. Need a gun?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_WellalrightO: Well, alright. Ok... so you will have to show me that you "know your way around firearms."
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_Whileyoudolo: While you do look... interesting... we have a strict policy on discounts, and they're only available to members.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_NPC_YesterdayIwo: One time I woke up to five of those... small ones.. trying to scamper off with one of my Corpsemakers!
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Doyouhaveany: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Howdoyoulike: How do you like the church?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Ihaveachurch: I have a church where you could set up shop. Up there, you'll at least have one customer.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Imkindofabig: I'm kind of a big deal, can you give me a discount?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_NoImeanItloo: No I mean... It looks great!
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Showmewhatyo: Show me what you have for sale.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_SureIllhavea: Sure, I'll have a look at your wares.
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_WellhowdoIbe: Well, how do I become a member, then?
Dialog/HauklandSalesman_PLA_Whyisyoursho: Why is your shop so... dilapidated?
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Andwithaboveaverageb: And with... above average belief you may have become a great addition to our ranks.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_AreyousureaboutthatF: Are you sure about that, Father?
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_AsIfeltyoudefileitwi: As I felt you defile it with your filthy amulet.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Asainttothelivingper: A saint to the living, perhaps.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_ButalasYourfacebring: But alas... Your face brings me anger.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Butfewwholaidtheirey: But few who laid their eyes on me in Sulfur have lived long enough to call me anything at all.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Dontmakemelaughlowli: Don't make me laugh, lowlife priest. You know damn well who I am.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Forapriestyoumustbeq: For a priest, you must be quite the formidable warrior to have been able to make it close to my chambers.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Icouldgoonbutyouhave: I could go on, but you have already been graced with too many words.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_IfoundtheshrineandIg: I found the shrine, and I gazed into the pools... it burnt me. It blinded me... again.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_InsolentfleshgolemTh: Insolent flesh golem! They fear me, and fear is power.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Itisboundtomebyfate: It is bound to me by fate.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Ittookmybeautymyrigh: It took my beauty, my right to sainthood, in exchange for power.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_IwasburntIwasblinded: I was burnt, I was blinded and I was defiled. When I crossed over here my body was restored. A second chance.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Nooneoutsidemyguildh: No one outside my guild has a chance in hell for enlightenment. Scraping the souls of the city's lowlife is frankly putting them out of their misery. A mercyful act.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_OutofcuriosityStatey: Out of curiosity. State your business, before I turn you to ash.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_ThenIthinkitstimeIre: Then I think it's time I remove that face of yours.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_ThepriceoftoheavenEv: The price of admission to heaven. Everyone in Sulfur is impure and needs to pay in soul for admission, and one's own soul doesn't suffice.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_ThisshrineismineIcan: This shrine is mine. I can assure you, if it had been touched I'd know.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_WecollectTheCostGivi: We collect The Cost. Giving the truly faithful eternal peace.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Youareabouttoshareth: You are about to share that fate.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Youarecruelforshowin: You are cruel for showing it to me, and I will have to purge it from your skull.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Youcrawlinthefilthwi: You crawl in the filth with the lowlife and peasants. You serve poorly.
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Youdareshowmeyourfac: You dare show me your face?
Dialog/Lucia_NPC_Youdontwearamaskinfr: You don't wear a mask in front of the matriarch of the Black Guild.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_AhyesLuciaSaintofthe: Ah, yes. Lucia. Saint of the blind.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_AndIthinkitsabouttim: And I think it's about time for me to have a look under that mask.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Andwhatdoyoudowithth: And what do you do with that power? Kill innocents, wreak havoc?
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_CoolthenIlljustrideo: Cool, then I'll just ride off in the sunset and-
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_DontbehastyLetmespea: Don't be hasty. Let me speak.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Dontyouevenwanttokno: Don't you even want to know why I'm here?
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_FirstIgottoaskWhyist: First, I got to ask; Why is this shrine in your castle?
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Iamalsooutofwordsbut: I am also out of words, but I'm not out of bullets.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_ImonamissionButIdeci: I'm on a mission. But I decided to end your reign of terror, you know, as a side-quest.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Imsearchingforawitch: I'm searching for a witch of the woods.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Iveheardenoughofyour: I've heard enough of your insane ramblings.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Iwasleadtotheshrinei: I was led to the shrine in this castle. I've heard the witch seeks it to restore her power.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_MatriarchoftheBlackG: Matriarch of the Black Guild? I've heard you're merely an uncontrollable weapon of the bishops.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_ThankGodcouldntstand: Thank God, couldn't stand to listen to you for another second.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_TheymadeyouTheyuseyo: They made you. They use you.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_WebothservethesameHe: We both serve the same Heaven. This is not our way.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_WhatdoyoumeanyoursIt: What do you mean yours? It's filled with primordial blood of the earth mother... or something like that.
Dialog/Lucia_PLA_Youreafuckingclichdo: You're a fucking cliché, do you know that?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Aintseenanyon: Ain't seen anyone... or “anything” in months that haven’t been out to hang me... or peck my eyes out... or make sushi out of my innards. So, it truly is a pleasure.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Anabstraction: An abstraction of a spiral stair case, a metaphor they say. But I have also heard it’s an actual real thing. Lowly ranked members like myself didn’t have access to that type of thing.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_AnywaySeeingp: Anyway. Seeing people better looking than her, which I’ve heard is pretty much anyone, will make her berserk.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Atonepointafe: At one point a few months in the bishops gave me an order that I could not bring myself to do... so I deserted.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Beenhereforth: Been here for the longest time. Their prey seem to come from nearby forests, to the sort of enchanted siren song that ends with a... manic laughter. Rumor has it that the Craw is led by a witch.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Bishopsfromwh: Bishops, from what I heard. Said the design is devine by nature, the ones of us that had visions agree. They’ve seen angels with smooth marble... perfect faces. Pretty much became a staple of the Black guild from then on.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Butapartfromn: But apart from not being saints, it seemed a lot less... evil, from the stories I’ve heard and the recorded history.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Christma-youl: Christma-... you listen here. You wouldn't even have seen me if I weren't standing here. I just figured I’d present a friendly face, one human to another.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_CuriousSeemsl: Curious? Seems like a bit of a macabre thing to be curious about... let’s keep this short, you’re making me a bit uncomfortable.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Gladtobeofser: Glad to be of service. What’s on your mind?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_He-heyrelaxno: He- hey relax now... I’ve reformed! I’m giving you any information you want. What more can you ask?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Hopefullynott: Hopefully not too much more, I’m getting a bit anxious standing still here.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Idbeeninforab: I’d been in for about two months, and me being a go getter I guess they thought I was “all in”, so they ordered me to “scrape” the souls of any children I could find in Town.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_IdespiseLucia: I despise Lucia, if I wasn’t scared out of my pants I’d be extremely offended that you think I would consider that bitch “precious”. (Looks around nervously)
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Iguessthatsfa: I guess that’s fair... hmm... well. They’re pretty much the only large living thing here, they eat everything they can catch, that can’t hide or burrow itself.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Ihadseenitbee: I had seen it been done once the week before, and that was seeing it one time too many.
