Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_IiiihIknowrig: Iiiih... I know right? You’re too kind. I’ve been working on it a lot. Itterating over time. This is version 7, I haven’t had any reason changing this one up yet.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Iknowitsnotan: I know it's not an easy thing to forgive, and I don't really forgive myself either, which probably means I'll be in Sulfur for quite a while.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_ImJaquesPleas: I’m Jaques. Pleased to meet you, even in these circumstances. Chances to trade supplies come few and far between.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_ImalivearentI: I’m alive aren’t I? Besides, other mushrooms have told me so, and I trust their judgement.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Itsliterallyf: It’s literally flaying the soul from the flesh, before the person is dead. After then the soul sheds on its own, disperses, and can’t be captured.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Itwasafigureo: It was a figure of speech! They actually do it tho, put organs in boxes that is. You're the one getting caught up in the gruesome details
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_ItwasanEXAMPL: It was an EXAMPLE. An example you seem to be extra curious about?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Ivebeenhiding: I’ve been hiding out here for the better part of a year.  Becoming one with the environment. Surviving on a diet of nuts and cones.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Iwantedtoserv: I wanted to serve God and country. But in the end I just witnessed my bretheren commit henuious acts, and... I guess enabled them to be fair.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Iwasntaroundt: I wasn’t around to see that but from what I’ve gathered that’s correct. I don’t know much about the guild dealings from before.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Justdonthurtm: Just don’t hurt me, all right?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_KarmicallyIsu: Karmically I suppose that's punishment enough.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Luciawearsthe: Lucia wears them, so we wear them... I don’t really know what happened to her but I heard at some point she burnt her face real bad, and had her... eyes removed?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_NaturallyIkno: Naturally... I know better now, and I know about the Infinite Void™ that awaits anyone dying here. Oh God...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Notproudofthi: Not proud of this one for sure... but I used to be a Black Guild soldier.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_OfcoursenotWa: Of course not. Wait... you have x-ray vision or something? You're seeing more organs? Oh God...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Ohitbotheredm: Oh, it bothered me for sure. But you have to understand... most of us believe that the flesh is but a vessel, it isn't too much of a significance what happens to it.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Ohitshorrible: Oh, it’s horrible. Went against all I’ve learnt... salvation is giving your soul freely. But scraping involves peeling the soul of any living matter... and children are full of soul.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_OrIwouldiftha: Or I would, if that functionality had been implemented.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Rathergoliket: Rather go like that than burn alive.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_RightokThisis: Right, ok. This is what we’ll do. You’ll leave, and come back again. I swear you won’t find me.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Seemsabitmorb: Seems a bit morbid that’s all. Aren’t you supposed to be a priest?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Sonoweveryone: So now everyone in the guild wears them at all times, and are not comfortable without them... they even take it upon themselves to kill within their ranks seeing someones face.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Thatbeingsaid: That being said, I’m not sure it would be hanging. But that’s beside the point. Why do you care so much about what they would do?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Thatsalsopret: That’s also pretty much when the guild adopted the square spiral instead of the cross.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Thatsasharpey: That’s a sharp eye you have, seeing through all this camo. I would prefer if we make this somewhat quick, you’re sticking out.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_TheBlackGuild: The Black Guild of course. They don’t really approve of deserters.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_TheCrawMonste: The Craw! Monster birds. Bewitched, horrible. Violent. Wait... why do you care so much about eye pecking?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_TheShavWaPaga: The Shav’Wa. Pagan god damn lizard people. They come to the forest every once in a while. Seem to be foraging and hunting, even killing people.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Theorganizati: The organization became a lot more rigid after that, having a direct link to God and all.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Therewerealso: There were also a lot less followers, by a huge margin.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Theyputorgans: They put organs in little boxes and carry them off... I think they eat them.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_TheysymbolDiv: The symbol? Divine systematic chaos infinity. Someone discovered that the holy is not as organic as it seems, but that there’s a system too it.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Thisforestisa: This forest is anything but harmonious. The siren song has been unusually quiet for a while though. So the Craw is getting restless...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Waitfirstyoup: Wait, first you praise it then you... ah, you’re being sarcastic. How original. Lucky for me I will not store your petty words, because I think therefore I am, and I’m alive therefor the suit works.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Waitwhydoyouc: Wait... why do you care so much about innards? Are you some sort of cannibal?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_YeahIdefinite: Yeah, I definitely would rather talk about something else. What’s on your mind?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_YeahIvenevers: Yeah, I’ve never seen one but I wouldn’t doubt that it’s true. The sound is extremely witchy and there’s no way these Craw are anything but a “naturally evil” invasive species.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_YikeSighIgues: Yike! Sigh... I guess I can totally relate to that. But hear me out, don’t eat me ok? I’ll show you my good wares. Just chill, all right?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Youhavereally: You have really good taste sir. I think I’ll show you my good wares, you might appreciate them, being so generous with your kind words.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Yourefunnyare: You’re funny aren’t you? I believe you’ve run into a few of the guild... they seem like people who would give you a good reference on your resume and send you along?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_YouthinkYoush: You think? You show up out here in the middle of nowhere, armed and you talk about innards? To someone who has a lot of innards?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_NPC_Youuseastrang: You use a strange dagger that vibrates, then collects the soul in a crystal chamber. It looks like, liquid smoke...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_ActuallyIdlik: Actually I’d like to ask you something.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_AhIguessIcoul: Ah, I guess I could buy something then.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Cantfaultthat: Can’t fault that logic. Let’s talk about something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_CrapguessIllh: Crap, guess I'll have a look at the normal stuff then.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Damnwouldbesc: Damn, would be scared to know what version 1 looked like...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Diabolicallet: Diabolical... let’s do business so we can part ways.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQ: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Doyouhavemore: Do you have more innards than the average person... ?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Facesareprett: Faces are pretty ugly after all.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_FinebymeLetsl: Fine by me. Let’s lighten up a bit. There’s other things to discuss.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Gottaloveagoo: Gotta love a good mystery. What else information you got?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_GuessIneedtog: Guess I need to go to more clergy seminars.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_HahaNothatstr: Haha! No, that’s true. But now it’s my time to be sent... along.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Holditrightth: Hold it right there. Did you say a witch?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Icanseeallofy: I can see all of your items, I might be interested in trading.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Icouldtellfro: I could tell from your face you were one of them, I’ve been swatting you like flies recently. Even your precious Lucia.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Idonthavetime: I don't have time for this...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_IfyousaysoIha: If you say so. I have more questions.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Igotallthewar: I got all the wares I need, sadly. Farewell.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Iguessyourcam: I guess your camouflage must be really good then. Being in one piece and all.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Ihaveafaintfe: I have a faint feeling that we've met before.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Ihopeyoucanli: I hope you can live with yourself.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Ihopeyoursoul: I hope your soul is intact.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Ijustwanttokn: I just want to know more about these birds. They seem like a bit of an anomaly.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Illgiveyouahe: I’ll give you a head start.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_IllleaveDontw: I’ll leave. Don’t want to blow your cover.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Illnotholdita: I’ll not hold it against you. If you just keep talking.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imaybeabletot: I may be able to trade you something better than cones. Let’s see.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imeanitwasodd: I mean, it was oddly specific. I was just-
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imgladyoucame: I’m glad you came to your senses.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imnotsosureab: I’m not so sure about that. You’re quite visible.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imnotsurechri: I’m not sure “christmas mushroom” is best practice when it comes to concealment.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Imnotsurprise: I’m not surprised, your camouflage -IS- extremely impressive.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Ineedwordsout: I need words out of you, not your guts. Answer my questions.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_InterestingLe: Interesting. Let me ask you something, perhaps a little less close to home.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Iprefermyhuma: I prefer my humans less... fungy.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Iseeseveralan: I see several answers to questions in your mind that I'd like explanations for.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_IsupposenotLe: I suppose not. Let me ask you something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Itstrulyawork: It’s truly a work of art!
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Justbeingdili: Just being diligent. That’s all I need. Farewell!
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Letmeaskyouso: Let me ask you something else...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_NotonlythatIm: Not only that! I’m also a bit of a hustler. Want to trade?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_O-ookletmeask: O-ook... let me ask you something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Showmeyourshi: Show me your shit. Hurry up, ain’t got all day.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_SighImmorecur: [Sigh] I’m more curious about what you have to trade.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Sometimesyouj: Sometimes you just have to do what you have to do to...
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Sotheguilddid: So, the guild didn’t wear them before what happened to Lucia?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Soundshorribl: Sounds horrible... let’s talk about something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Surethatsagoo: Sure, that’s a good use of my time. See you soon.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_ThankyouLetsg: Thank you. Let’s get back to my other questions.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thankyouforth: Thank you for the information, Jaques.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_ThatsallIneed: That’s all I needed to know, hehe.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatsallthein: That’s all the information I need.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatshighprai: That’s high praise. Let me ask you something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatskindofyo: That’s kind of you, perhaps you can spare the time to answer a few questions.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatsonehello: That’s one hell of an conclusion to draw from that ques-
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatsprobably: That’s probably the most relevant information I’ve gotten so far. Mind if I ask you something else?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thatstoospook: That’s too spooky for me, I gotta get out of here.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Thenletsmaket: Then let’s make the most of this opportunity, show me what you got.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Trulyfabjustf: Truly fab, just felt like telling you. Ciao!
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_TrustmeIdontl: Trust me, I don’t like hanging any more than the next person. Forget it. I have other questions.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whatwastheord: What was the order that you couldn’t follow?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whoenforcedth: Who enforced the masks to begin with?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whowantstomak: Who wants to make sushi out of your innards?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whowantstopec: Who wants to peck your eyes out?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whyareyououth: Why are you out here Jaques?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Whydidntyouju: Why didn’t you just turn in your papers?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Yeahnowthatyo: Yeah, now that you mention it, what does it symbolize?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Yesletswrapth: Yes, let’s wrap this up with some trading while you still have your eyes.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_YeswellIthink: Yes, well. I think we’re misunderstanding each other a bit. Let’s talk about something else.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Youbroughtitu: You brought it up, honestly, I don-
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_YouknowalotJa: You know a lot Jaques! What more do you know?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Youregoingtob: You’re going to be in Sulfur for a very long time “mate”.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_YourerightImu: You’re right... I must leave and contemplate.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_Youweretheone: You were the one that mentioned it! What’s wrong with you?
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_YupIseeawalnu: Yup, I see a walnut sized brain. I'll leave you to it.
Dialog/PrepperDefector_PLA_andthatwasthe: ... and that was the final straw? The mass murdering didn’t bother you?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_ActuallyIdidhearinte: Actually I did hear intel of something like that.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Andtheresnothingtolo: And there's nothing to look forward to.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Andyoudomatchthedesc: And you do match the description...
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_AnywayImabouttoshowy: Anyway, I'm about to show you the secret shelf, right? Viva la resistance.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Aspywouldneverbethat: A spy would never be that dumb. Haha... feet of may, weirdest shit I've ever heard.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_BecauseImlikedyingof: Because I'm like, dying of boredom over here.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Beforethatanyonewasw: Before that anyone was welcome here.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Boothserviceisthreey: Booth service is three years. So for some kids the choice ain't that obvious.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Butbesidesyourbullsh: But besides your bullshit comment we're both victims of this oppressive new regime. I and I'd rather have a free country...
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Butwhateverhelpsyous: But whatever helps you sleep at night, believers.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Canteventakeanapbeca: Can't even take a nap, because as soon as I do some naked thick idiot shows up and wants to buy some frog legs.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_DontworryaboutmeImve: Don't worry about me, I'm vegan. Human is quite a delicacy here though. Nothing personal.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Eatsawayabitofmyyoun: Eats away a bit of my young rebel soul every time. I try to salvage what I can by saying it as sarcasticly as possible.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Especiallysincealoto: Especially since a lot of people get hubris after their first win and keep fighting, even though they don't have too.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Everyoneseemstohavea: Everyone seems to have a really convenient little amnesia before they're indoctrinated into that shit. So it's really hard to subscribe to.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_FeellikeIbetterpedal: Feel like I better pedal this back before you infect me with your... dumb germs.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Formedjustthesameast: Formed just the same as the every day underground household really. Just a lot larger.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_HahPaidThisisslavela: Hah! Paid? This is slave labour.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_HahamymanagersureLis: Haha, my "manager", sure. Listen up, piggy. It's pretty obvious you're not really supposed to be here. So either you wise up or I WILL call my "manager." I'm sure he'd like a word.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_HellnoButthesheeraud: Hell no! But the sheer audacity of that will give you a pass.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Humanswithinthecityw: Humans within the city walls, or approaching on the bridge should be killed on sight or captured.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Icouldbutthequestion: I could, but the question itself is too boring.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Igotcaughsmokingasqa: I got caught smoking a sqatty beneath the bleachers, and apparently since a year ago with the new laws, I am under age.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Imeantechnicallyrevo: I mean technically... revolution is sort of constant in any society. Bubbling under the surface, waiting for the right moment.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_IsaidblindnotdeafGod: I said blind, not deaf. God, what's wrong with you?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Itsatrickforthicksku: It's a trick for thick skulled jock types. Win a fight and you're pardoned AND you get a bag of cash.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_ItsbecauseIdontcarea: It's because I don't care about the emperors new agenda.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Itscompletebullshitb: It's complete bullshit, but naturally everyone goes banans over this and hands over all the power to "the most holy one."
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Itsfuckingbullshitbe: It's fucking bullshit, because everyone does it.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Itslikeanyotherplace: It's like any other place, and the people are like anywhere else. Everything is just dipped in exotic fucking mystery. Welcome to Shav'Wa city.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Iwillforgetyousaidth: I will forget you said that and we'll start over.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Justbuysomethingorno: Just buy something, or not, and have a wonderful day.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_ListenuppiggyItspret: Listen up, piggy. It's pretty obvious you're not really supposed to be here. So either you wise up or I'll call my supervisor.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Mightcomeasnewstoyou: Might come as news to you, as  you're obviously a piggyman. No offense. But not all Shav'Wa are violent assholes.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Mostfolkaroundheredo: Most folk around here don't believe the past world myth. There's no evidence for it at all. We're all born into Sulfur.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Mostnicenormalpeople: Most nice normal people live underground away from the sun. Beneath the city. That's why you're probably not running into very many.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Mycodewandtakingafuc: Myco dew and taking a fucking bath is apparently not for normal folk anymore, even though it's been part of our culture for about... ten thousand years?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Newgovernmentisrigid: New government is rigid as hell, only reason I'm here is because it was either this or the ring.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_NoshitShavlockCouldn: No shit Shav'lock. Couldn't be more peaceful.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Nothingsbeennicesinc: Nothing's been nice since he came along.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Notonlydoyouprobably: Not only do you probably have several murder charges pending, but even stepping foot in Shav'Wa city as a human is punishable by death, according to the new regulations.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Ofcoursewehaveourleg: Of course, we have our legend about the Shav'Wa realm that would be our proposed home world.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Ohacustomerandahuman: Oh, a customer, and a human one at that. I hope you're not boring
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_OhandoneanecdoteIthi: Oh, and one anecdote I think you'll probably find confusing. Every Shavvy was born here. The records go back tens of thousands of years.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_OhboyNowweregettings: Oh boy. Now we're getting somewhere.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Ourhistoryislongerth: Our history is longer than pretty much anyones, but no Shav has "passed over" for as long as the records can tell.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_PastlifeafterlifeSha: Past life, afterlife... Shav'Wa live in the now, because the Infinite Void™ is the only thing any of us have to look forward too.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Perhapsitwaslikethis: "Perhaps it was like this but all the evidence is gone." How practical.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Rulesdontsayanything: Rules don't say anything about it.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_SeethatsthethingThat: See that's the thing. That's what all the fuss is about. Our current emperor suddenly just showed up one day, claiming to have passed over, as the first of our kind for countless millenia.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_SighImtheonesellingy: Sigh... I'm the one selling you this delicious garbage.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_SighJustbelievewhatm: (Sigh) Just... believe what makes you happy all right? Let's get back to the programming.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_SighLetsseehereinthe: (Sigh) Let's see here in the booklet... (Mockingly flips invisible pages)
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_SighRightNamesQioskI: Sigh. Right. Name's Qiosk, I'm a political prisoner of the Shav'wa state.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Sighboringanddissapo: Sigh... boring and dissapointing. A new low...
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Sincethenewregimeonl: Since the new regime only the warrior, priest and politician classes are allowed there.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Thecitywasbuiltontop: The city was built on top of the bathhouses back in the "primitive days", and not the other way around.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Themostholyoneofcour: "The most holy one" of course seems to want to make the rich richer, eat food, fornicate and watch poor people kill each other.  Bless him.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Thepeopleinpowerbene: The people in power benefit. Story as old as time.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Theresthenothingatal: There's the nothing at all to do.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_TheresthepalaceRuled: There's the palace. Ruled by "His most holy Emperor." (Rolls eyes)
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Theyrejustfindingare: They're just finding a reason to have people work shit jobs for nothing or kill each other for entertainment.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Thisisgettingevenbor: This is getting even boringer. So let's get this over with...
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Usedtobeopenforevery: Used to be open for everyone, caves formed of erosion of thousands of years of Shavvy sweat and Myco dew.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Veryfewventureupifth: Very few venture up if they're not warrior class, or upper class and it's almost only for entertainment or religious reasons.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_WelcometoShavWaChowh: "Welcome to Shav'Wa Chow, how can I serve you today master?" (Sigh)
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Weresupposedtobeprog: We're supposed to be progressive, man.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_WhosaidthatReachingo: Who said that? (Reaching out with hands)
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_WhydoyouthinkHavingt: Why do you think? Having to sit here in this kiosk all day, only to be interrupted by entitled customers wanting to complain about something?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Yeahtheresthespecial: Yeah, there's the "special wares" reserved for the friends of the resistance.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Yeahtheyputdudesinar: Yeah, they put dudes in a ring to beat each other to death for sport, but mostly entertainment. It's barbaric as fuck.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_YoufiguremeasnitchIt: You figure me a snitch? It's pretty obvious you're not really supposed to be here. So either you wise up or I'll call my supervisor.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Yourearightweirdoare: You're a right weirdo aren't you?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_YouseriousThisisasmu: You serious? This is as much my home as any Shav. Look, It's pretty obvious you're not really supposed to be here. So either you wise up or I WILL call my "manager." I'm sure he'd like a word.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_Youshowingupheredoes: You showing up here does seem like a bit too much of a coincidence. So...
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_YouthinkIwouldhaveth: You think I would have that a lame password?
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_YupDontforgetthemost: Yup. Don't forget "His most holy", or you might end up selling snails for three years.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_YupItsthelineIhaveto: Yup. It's the line I have to say every damn time.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_andrathernotsellassh: ... and rather not sell assholes like yourself treats for three years, due to some minor bullshit.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_isthatrightYouknowwh: ... is that right? You know what. I'm starting to think our interests might be aligned.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_ortheyreservingthese: ... or they're serving these bastards. Like me.
Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_therearepeopleoutthe: ... there are people out there trying.

Dialog/Qiosk_NPC_youarenthalfasboring: ... you aren't half as boring as most, I'll give you that. Tell me more.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Allrightsoletsrollth: Alright, so, let's roll this back (Gesture with fingers)
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Anevilwitchburntdown: An evil witch burnt down my church, with all my people in it. I followed her and this talking amulet told me to go deep into a cave, where I crossed over through a portal.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Dontyouhaveadutytore: Don't you have a duty to report?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_EveryonewasbornhereS: Everyone was born here... ? Some must've passed over.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_GoodtalkKeepyourhead: Good talk. Keep your head down, all right?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_GuessShavWaChowistop: Guess Shav'Wa Chow is top of the food chain here then, haha. Get it? Food chain?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Haventseenalotofevid: Haven't seen a lot of evidence of that.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_HoldthatthoughtHavet: Hold that thought. Have to go to the bathroom.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Iactuallycameoverher: I actually came over here originally without even dying.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Ialsohadsomememorylo: I also had some memory loss, not from crossing over but... driving into a tree.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_IamYoulookabitlikeaw: I am. You look a bit like a wimp.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_IbettergetoutofhereL: I better get out of here.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_IcanappreciatethatBu: I can appreciate that. But... all right. Let's start over.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_IguessIalsobenefitby: I guess I also benefit by getting to buy food!
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Ijustcantwinwithyouc: I just can't win with you can I?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Iknowalotofpeoplewho: I know a lot of people who passed over.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_ImabitpeckishLetssee: I'm a bit peckish! Let's see...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Imnotlookingtogetinv: I'm not looking to get involved.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Imprettysurethatsnot: I'm pretty sure that's not true.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Imstartingtoseeyourp: I'm starting to see your point.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Imyselfhavethetenden: I myself have the tendency to just go revolutionize in a very direct manner if need be.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Itraveledspaceandtim: I traveled space and time specifically to end up here and buy some frog legs from you.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_ItsmeOverhereHelloCa: It's me! Over here! Hello? Can you hear me?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Itwasclearlythewisec: It was clearly the wise choice.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Iwasabouttobuysometh: I was about to buy something that's just rude.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Iwasjustlookingforso: I was just looking for some food.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_IzonedoutCanyoustart: I zoned out Can you start from the top? From where I could buy food here?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Justletsjuststartove: Just... let's just start over all right? We're going nowhere.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_KnockitofforIllrepor: Knock it off, or I'll report you myself for not taking this human threat seriously.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_LamepasswordFromthel: Lame password? From the look of you? Yes.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_LetmerephraseYoulive: Let me rephrase; You live here. Why haven't you shot at me yet?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_LikeIddareeatanythin: Like I'd dare eat anything you serve...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_MakessenseYoudontstr: Makes sense. You don't strike me as a prize fighter.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_MasterThatssomeopres: Master? That's some oppressive shit. They actually make you say that?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Nothearinganythingab: Not hearing anything about being banned from ordering food!
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Ofcoursenotareyoudum: Of course not, are you dumb?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_OhIneedtofarawayByeL: Oh... I need to far away. Bye!
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_OhOkmybadLetsseewhat: Oh... Ok, my bad. Let's see what you... have here.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_OhallrightLetshaveal: Oh, all right. Let's have a look then.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Perhapsyourhomeworld: Perhaps your home world was destroyed long ago?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Perhapsyoushouldntha: Perhaps you shouldn't have broken the law then.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_PoliticalprisonerWit: Political prisoner? Without bruises? They're too easy on you.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Politicsinmypersonal: Politics in my personal adventure? Get out of here.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Seemslikeyourenotthe: Seems like you're not the xenophobic type then? Not calling the guards I mean.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_SeethatwasntsohardPl: See, that wasn't so hard? Pleased to meet you. Gotta go.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Sellingfoodrathertha: Selling food rather than fighting to the death does seem like the reasonable choice.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_SincethenIvebeendefe: Since then I've been defending the hell out of myself across the realm searching for power sources that will help me get revenge, lift the curse, and possibly even turn back time.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Someoneshouldputasto: Someone should put a stop to this madness.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Sowhatwereyouselling: So... what were you selling again?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_SpecialSoundsexpensi: Special? Sounds expensive... you know what. Let's just go with the normal routine.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_ThatsseemsunsafeIbet: That seems unsafe. I better get out of here.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Thenperhapsyoucanasa: Then perhaps you can, as a sign of good faith, present yourself?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Theresnotevenrefrige: There's not even refrigeration in this cart...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Therevolutionmakesit: The revolution makes itself does it? Good excuse.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Thewindsblowatthefee: The winds blow at the feet of May.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Thewonderfuldayisfre: The wonderful day is free, so...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Thisisabittoomuchfor: This is a bit too much for me.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_TypicalwhinyyouthTak: Typical whiny youth. Take some responsibility will you?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Watchyourtonedipshit: Watch your tone dipshit, the customer is always right. Where's your manager?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wellthisbastardishun: Well, this bastard is hungry, so...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Welltreasonwouldbeab: Well, treason would be a bit much. You should probably report if you heard anything about that.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wellwhileyoureherean: Well, while you're here anyway. What's on the menu?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wellyoucouldstartare: Well, you could start a revolution or something.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Whathappenstothecapt: What happens to the captured ones?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_WhenImdonewiththispl: When I'm done with this place, there'll probably be no one to check up on you.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Whyarentyoudoinganyt: Why aren't you doing anything about it?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Whyisntanyonedoingan: Why isn't anyone doing anything about it?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_WhyisthatWhywouldntI: Why is that? Why wouldn't I be able to be here?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wontwastemybreathona: Won't waste my breath on a non-believer.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wouldntbethefirstedi: Wouldn't be the first edible fueler I've grilled.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Wouldntbethefirstevi: Wouldn't be the first evil ruler I've killed...
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Yeahbeingscrawnlylik: Yeah, being scrawnly like that, you'd get murked within ten seconds.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Yeahitmightnothavebe: Yeah, it might not have been much, but once I invented a super revolutionizing way to fold milk cartons. They took up only one forth of the space of the best possible fold known to date!
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Youcouldbeabitmoresp: You could be a bit more specific than that.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Youmightveheardabout: You might've heard about St. Lucia and the Black Guild? I singlehandedly dethroned her and decimated their ranks.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_YousaidfoodNowyougot: You said food? Now you got me hungry.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_Youshouldjuststickth: You should just stick this out, and keep with the program. You'll be done in no time. What was the line again... ?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_YoutalkaboutboringYo: You talk about boring? Your world view is a fucking snoozer.
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_areyouevenallowedtos: ... are you even allowed to serve humans?
Dialog/Qiosk_PLA_thinkyouheardmeImayb: I think you heard me. I may be able to help you.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Andifyoudontthenwhat: And if you don't... then what does it matter what planey existance thing you're on?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Beatsmeneithermeormy: Beats me, neither me or my babies seem to be affected. Nor you?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_ButIdorememberthatIf: But I do remember that I feel great being here in the sewers with my babies.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Butitlookstomethatif: But it looks to me that if anyone would need that warning, it would be you.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Didyouknowthatagoodd: Did you know that a good deed erases a bad deed?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Dontmakepromisesyouc: Don't make promises you can't keep.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Doyouknowitsbeenacou: Do you know it's been a couple of years since I've talked to anybody?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_GuessIllhavetotakeyo: Guess I'll have to take your word for it, darlin'.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Iassumeyouvegottomak: I assume you've got to make the best out of what you're given.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Ihavebeenworkingvery: I have been working very hard at keeping people away. Haven't I?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Ijustwokeuphereoneda: I just woke up here one day, one of these little cuties nibbling on my nose. I didn't leave because... you've been up there, to be frank this seemed like the safest place, at the time at least. I'd rather be down here with the rats, who love me... and cheese.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_IminthesewerIguess: I'm in the sewer I guess?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_LookdarlinImightnotr: Look, darlin'. I might not remember much if anything at all...
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_OfcoursetheydoSowhat: Of course they do. So what you must do now is you must think of the most important thing that you can do for others and go and do it. Just follow the star in your heart.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_OhyeahthosetooStarte: Oh yeah, those too. Started coming down here like they were looking for something... I think they're sort of regretting that at this point.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Somethingtellsmeyoul: Something tells me you'll be all good in the end though.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Sowhatareyoudoingrun: So what are you doing running around the streets on Christmas Eve on your own? Did you get into trouble?
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_Startedafewweeksagon: Started a few weeks ago, noticed the lurks starting to behave weirdly, coughing black goo and turning all aggressive. I've lost both Wilma and Rascal to these bastards.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_SulfurNeverheardofit: Sulfur? Never heard of it. Sounds a bit like hogwash to me.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_TheyreloyalTheylikec: They're loyal. They like cheese. What's not to like? Some people dislike their tails, but I think they look like cute hairy worms.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_WellIdontrememberent: Well, I don't remember entirely... The locals call me the Rat Queen, so I've just taken that to heart. I do love rats, and I am a bit of a boss.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_WellhellothereWeusua: Well hello there. We usually don't get a lot of visitors down here... well, if you don't count the mutants.
Dialog/RatQueen_NPC_WellitsChristmasEveG: Well, it's Christmas Eve. Good deeds count for extra tonight.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_AhIguessIcouldbuysom: Ah, I guess I could buy something then.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_CheeseyousayLetmeche: Cheese you say? Let me check what you have.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_DontworryaboutitCanI: Don't worry about it. Can I ask you something else?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_GladyouthinksoLetmea: Glad you think so! Let me ask you some other questions.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_GuessIllleaveyoutooi: Guess I'll leave you too it then.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Howcomeyoudontseemto: How come you don't seem to be affected?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_IalwaysthinkIllhavea: I always think I'll have a lot of fun if I'm alone... but when I'm alone, it's not that much fun at all. I don't care how much people bug me sometimes, I'd rather be with someone than by myself.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Idliketoaskyouabouts: I'd like to ask you about something...
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Ifyouneedsomebodytot: If you need somebody to trust, it can be me. I won't forget to remember you.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Iguessitstimetogokic: I guess it's time to go kick some ass then.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Iintendtokeepitthatw: I intend to keep it that way.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_IllbefineIhavetogetg: I'll be fine. I have to get going.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Imeanmorelikedoyoukn: I mean more like, do you know that you're in Sulfur?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Imnotsurethatshowitw: I'm not sure that's how it works.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_IseemokILetmeaskyoua: I seem ok. Let me ask you another question.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_IthinkImightvesaidto: I think I might've said too much already.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Itprobablyismostlyho: It probably is mostly hogwash actually...
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_ItsdefinitelynotChri: It's definitely not Christmas Eve. You're insane. We're insane?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Itsgettingprettylate: It's getting pretty late. l don't know if l'll have enough time to do all the good deeds l need to erase all the bad ones l did.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Justdontgetyourselfk: Just don't get yourself killed in this planey thing. It would have severe consequences for your soul.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Letmeaskyousomething: Let me ask you something else...
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Maytheyeverrestinpea: May they ever rest in peace.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_O-ookletmeaskyousome: O-ook... let me ask you something else.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_OkayItsgettingpretty: Okay. It's getting pretty late. I'd better get going. If I don't see you, I hope everything turns out okay.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_OnsecondthoughtImigh: On second thought, I might as well buy something.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Perhapsitsbetterifsh: Perhaps it's better if she doesn't know...
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Saygoodbyetoyourrats: Say goodbye to your rats for me.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Somethingstellingmey: Something's telling me you'll be in a more favourable planey thing in no time.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Soyourenotreallysure: So, you're not really sure where you are?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_ThatsokayYourereally: That's okay. You're really good at it. You're not boring. You don't mumble or spit when you talk. You should do it more often. Just wear an outfit with no rat poop on it.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Whatsthethingwiththe: What's the thing with the rats?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Whatthehellareyoutal: What the hell are you talking about?
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Youhavediedandcometo: You have died, and come to another plane of existence. Not a pleasant one I might add.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_YoureverywiseRatQuee: You're very wise, Rat Queen. I have another question.
Dialog/RatQueen_PLA_Yourheartmightstillb: Your heart might still be broken, but it isn't gone. If it was gone, you wouldn't be this nice.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Allthatwearandtearw: All that wear and tear, whether shooting your guns or taking damage with your armor. Eventually, everything breaks.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Atacertainpointiten: At a certain point it ended up being... not so much about motorcycles if you know what I mean. I figured it was time to get out.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Baneofmyfuckingexis: Bane of my fucking existence, pardon my french.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Beenhobblingaboutli: Been hobbling about like this ever since I passed over. No recollection of any fornication.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Cigarettecoughlaugh: (Cigarette cough laugh) Get the fuck out of here.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Doesntseemtobegrowi: Doesn't seem to be growing either. I can't even remember how long I've been like this.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_FiguredImightvegott: Figured I might've gotten myself one of those "parthenogenesis" or whatever, from the holy spirit or something along those lines.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_HahIllmanagefineBlo: Hah! I'll manage fine. (Blows out smoke)
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_HellIbuiltanx-raymy: Hell, I built an x-ray myself and had a look, but there's strange static blocking the rays somehow.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Idcallitavirginbirt: I'd call it a virgin birth thing but hell, would be a bit of a big lie to tell a priest. (Cigarette cough laugh)
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_IfanitembecomesBrok: If an item becomes Broken, it cannot be used anymore.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_ImsureGodsplanwontb: I'm sure Gods plan won't be thwarted by a few packs of menthol.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_ItismovingthosoIgue: It is moving tho, so I guess we'll see when the second coming is going to be a thing. Wouldn't wait up though. (Cigarette cough laugh)
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Ivegotallthetoolshe: I've got all the tools here to repair most any item, and if you ever need to do repairs in the field, well, that's when Repair Kits come in handy.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Iwasskepticalatfirs: I was skeptical at first, but now... I don't know, a hundred years later and still pregnant? This ain't normal.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Makesgunsbreakmoree: Makes guns break more easy, as well as raise the cost of repairs.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_OhlongstoryRanwiths: Oh, long story. Ran with some bad people, mostly fixing motorcycles.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Soanygatsorarmornee: So, any gats or armor need fixin'?
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Somakesureyoubalanc: So make sure you balance your arsenal. Bring a backup.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Soundsfromyourquest: Sounds from your question like you might be  in need of my services.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_SowhatwillitbeWantm: So, what will it be? Want me to take a look at your stuff?
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_SupFatherNeedmetota: Sup, Father. Need me to take a look at that piece?
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Themorestuffyouaddt: The more stuff you add to any device, the more stuff can break.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Tooksanctuarywithto: Took sanctuary with you all, living the simple life, tinkering away. Fits me a hell of a lot better.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Wellwhenyoureoutdoi: Well, when you're out doing your thing, your stuff will slowly break.
Dialog/Repairman_NPC_Weredoingthisagainf: We're doing this again, Father? Names Ralphie, certified troublemaker, unlicenced mechanic.
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfo: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Howdidyouendupatthe: How did you end up at the church?
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Mustbedifficultletm: Must be difficult... let me know if you need anything.
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_OhIdontwantanytroub: Oh, I don't want any trouble.
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_WhydoIneedtorepairi: Why do I need to repair items?
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Whydoessomeofmyguns: Why do some of my guns break so quickly?
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_YeahIthinksomeofmys: Yeah, I think some of my stuff could use repairs.
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Youhavesomethingtos: You have something to sell perhaps?
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Yourservicetothechu: Your service to the church is invaluable, Ralphie.
Dialog/Repairman_PLA_Youveaskedsomeoneto: You've asked someone to take a look at it?
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_AfterIgotmybearings: After I got my bearings when I ended up here, I managed to get a hold of him again as I figured demons don't really have souls.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_AhThatYeahgotintoso: Ah! That. Yeah, got into some trouble with the connect in the real world, hehe. This is actually what did me in a long time ago.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_AhrightIsteppedwron: Ah, right. I stepped wrong in fourth grade and limped along for an entire break. The rest is legend.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_AhwasntthatbadWehav: Ah, wasn't that bad. We have two arms for a reason.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_AhyouforgetagainThe: Ah, you forget again. They call me Stiffleg. Your local "antiquarian" if you will. Hehe.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Alwaysgottimeforyou: Always got time for you, papa. What's on your mind, interested in the haul out after all? Probably got some stuff you'd like.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Anywayyoureinterest: Anyway, you're interested in the haul?
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Beacuseitsjustabunc: Because it's just a bunch of propaganda. When it comes to dangerous entities, demons are among the most civilized I've encountered.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_ButatleastIgottotra: But at least I got to travel around, make trade routes. Learn about the place before you all crossed over to here, and the curse locked us in here.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Butbeingabletotakeb: But being able to take back my old trade routes would definitely fill out the shelves with more exotic stuff.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Didntwanttotalkmuch: Didn't want to talk much about it as I felt you would disapprove of their... demonic nature and such. Being a priest and all.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_EitherItravelandpro: Either I travel and procure stuff, which was made a lot harder by the black googly shite the witch put up everwhere. Or I get it from my connect.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Gotcaughtwiththeshi: Got caught with the shipment. Wouldn't give up my connect so got my skull caved in. That's how it goes.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Gottoprojectacertai: Got to project a certain level of unpredictability in my field, else you might be taken advantage off.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_HaharightofficerIll: Haha, right, "officer", I'll answer them best I can. Perhaps you're be interested in some definitely legally aquired items from the latest haul?
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Ibumpedintosomethin: I bumped into something that seemed almost... invisible. It turned out to be a camouflaged guy named Jaques. He pulled me away and patched me up.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Imnotthemantostrong: I'm not the man to strong arm anyone.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Imtheonlypersonfrom: I'm the only person from our congregation who got snuffed out before, and not in relation to... "the incident."
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Inlifemyscrappynatu: In life my... scrappy nature didn't really make me the most trusted member here. But I'm happy now that I found my role.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_IprocureandIprovide: I procure and I provide, evaluate and sell. Sometimes it's a bit of a swindle, yer lad's got to hustle you know.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Itsasevilasitgetswh: It's as evil as it gets when it comes to capitalism and stuff, of course. But the sort of hedonistic demon shit from the scriptures? Mostly bullshit.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Itslikeifyougoblind: It's like if you go blind your hearing becomes super? It's the same with arms.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Iwouldappreciateifn: I would appreciate if no one heard you call me that. Doesn't really fit the persona.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_LiterallyOhokwhatwa: Literally? Oh, ok, what was the line...
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Myrightarmistwiceas: My right arm is twice as powerful.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Naturallywouldntgiv: Naturally wouldn't give ye anything but the lowest price possible, Father.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_NobecauseofthatMost: Not because of that. Mostly because I'm a man of peace. I can still throw hands... hand if I need to.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_NoooonoooOfcourseno: Noooo, nooo. Of course not officer. Hehe. In all fairness, I trade proper. I might swindle a few, and some may have unknown origins, but it'll at least be a trade.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_OhthisThatsnothingS: Oh this? That's nothing. Sort of happened the while I was out exploring the Forest. Way before the witch stuff.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_RightIonlyhavetheri: Right, I only have the right left. The left stayed right where I left it.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_RightTalkingaboutit: Right? Talking about it makes it slightly easier to live with, each day.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_RightyouaresirImsti: Right you are, sir. For the longest time I've only been able to get things through the caves alone, and by my... connect.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Somakesuretocheckhe: So make sure to check here frequently as I restock often.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Suddenlyoutofnowher: Suddenly out of nowhere a massive were... crow or whatever popped up and pecked my god damn arm clean off in one peck!
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_ThanksvicarWasatrau: Thanks, vicar. Was a traumatic period, literally... Sitting there for a full class wondering if it was broken.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_ThankyoupadreButmyj: Thank you padre. But my job is to sell stuff. Not give out information. That's dangerous. Not interested in the Inifinite Void™.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Thebeastseemedtobeb: The beast seemed to be busy with my ex arm and I started crawling away.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Themostmagnificentc: The most magnificent camouflage I've ever seen. I have him to thank for all of this.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Theresanargumentfor: There's an argument for the weight reduction and spelunking in tight spaces also, but yeah whatever.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Theycrossfreelyover: They cross freely over both the "real world" and Sulfur and God knows what places with their portals. Which makes their ability to do trade and delivery services pretty much unmatched.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Theyrunatightshipan: They run a tight ship and have a massive delivery network, portals, cellphones and really snazzy uniforms.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Timebeforethatwashu: Time before the curse was hustler's paradise in comparison. So many interesting goods to peddle if you just knew where to find them.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Traderantiquariantr: Trader, antiquarian, treasure hunter wholesaler... "second hand"-owner, as some of these items can't really be guaranteed not to have been... owned by someone else before. Hehe.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Truerwordshavenever: Truer words have never been spoken. Were ye about to buy something or?
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Wasalonelyfewyearst: Was a lonely few years there, being the first of us to end up here.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_WasntbytheirbooksTh: Wasn't by their books. They don't take kindly to you if you don't play by the rules, and my guy wasn't supposed to trade me on the side.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Wasoutlookingfornut: Was out looking for nuts, as my connect was paying big money for nutspread at the time. Was trying to set up an operation to make it from scratch.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_WelcometoStifflegsW: Welcome to Stiffleg's. What can I do ye for padre? Got something for me, or here to browse the new haul?
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Wellyecanhearforyer: Well ye can hear for yerself why it was such a character creating moment. Name's stuck with me since.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Withhisprowessinste: With his prowess in stealth? I'm sure of it.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Yeahlikeavacationyo: Yeah, like a vacation...you god damn lunatic. Haha! Pardon the french, padre.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_YeahtheconnectHahai: Yeah, the connect. Haha, as I was saying, it's actually the same connect that did me in back in the life.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_Yourenotthefuzzarey: You're not the fuzz are you? Kiddin', kiddin'. Marcus is the name. Everyone calls me Stiffleg because of me injury.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_andhelpsmeremindpeo: ... and helps me remind people to call me Stiffleg and not... Marcus.
Dialog/Scavenger_NPC_yeahYoureinterested: ... yeah. You're interested in the haul or what?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Butwhataboutthefuck: But what about the fucking arm you're missing, lad? Hello?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_CoolIllfindyouwhenI: Cool. I'll find you when I need something.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_DemonicIcandefintel: Demonic? I can defintely understand that. Please explain.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfo: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_GoodtoknowIhavetole: Good to know. I have to leave for now.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_HaulHowdoyoufindall: Haul? How do you find all this stuff anyway?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Howtheheckdidyoumak: How the heck did you make it out of that one?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Illkeepthatinmindfo: I'll keep that in mind for my future visits. Got time to talk some more?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Illleaveyoutoworkon: I'll leave you to work on your shady persona.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_ImheadingoffMuchtod: I'm heading off. Much to do.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Imprettysuretheothe: I'm pretty sure the other arm isn't just a glorified spare tire but...
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Imsurethatwasinvalu: I'm sure that was invaluable to us.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_InterestingYourerea: Interesting. You're really damn good at your job Stiffleg.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Itakeityourassortme: I take it your assortment expands as I clear the paths?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Iwanttomakeafewmore: I want to make a few more inquiries.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Letsstartthisconver: ... Let's start this conversation over I think.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_RightLetsseewhatyou: Right. Let's see what you got.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_RightSorrysorryLets: Right. Sorry, sorry. Let's change the subject.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_SayitdontsprayitJee: Say it don't spray it. Jeez.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_SoundsgoodtomeShowm: Sounds good to me! Show me what you've got.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_StifflegWhatsyourre: Stiffleg? What's your real name then?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_ThatsquitearesumLet: That's quite a resumé. Let me see the goods.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_TwiceasstrongNotsur: Twice as strong? Not sure the world is ready for that type of power.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Wellgladtoseethatyo: Well, glad to see that you've recovered.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Whatdoesntkillyouma: What doesn't kill you make you stronger.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Whatthehellhappened: What the hell happened to you, Stiffleg?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Whogivesashitabouty: Who gives a shit about your slightly bruised leg? Your head is wrapped like a god damn mummy!
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Wouldntbethesamewit: Wouldn't be the same without you, Stiffleg.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Youmeanyoudidntdiei: You mean you didn't die in the fire?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Yourheadiswrappedin: Your head is wrapped in bandages.
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Yourlegslooklikeyou: Your legs look like your least injured part to be fair?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_Youthinkhesstillout: You think he's still out there?
Dialog/Scavenger_PLA_thefactthattheykill: ... the fact that they killed you might disprove that?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_AllrightItstheinkith: Alright. It's the ink, it holds pretty addictive properties.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Andbybeingprobablyth: And by being probably the least worthy bastards out there, me and my order aquired transcriptions from actual Shuen and their unique way of hearing the vibrations of the world.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Apparentlyitsjustaso: Apparently it's just a sound, and it has no meaning beyond how it... sounds? I guess it's like dolpins, or some shit. I don't know... I try stick to the symbols.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_ButIllsellyousomefor: But I'll sell you some for sure! I restock usually.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_ButtheShuenactuallyt: But the Shuen actually trade their wares here in Sulfur, not sure if it's because they're desperate or what. But it makes this hell of a lot easier.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Didntlooksuperhappya: Didn't look super happy about it but either they wouldn't or they couldn't really do anything about our presence.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Eachweaponcanonlyhol: Each weapon can only hold one enchantment, and it requires an empty rank slot.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Enchantmentsaresorto: Enchantments are sort of blessings you add to your weapon, imbuing them with special powers.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Exceptmaybeifyouwant: Except maybe if you want to go to the Infinite Void™. But I've yet to hear a sage person recommending that path.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_FirewayMightwanttomi: Fire away. Might want to mix those magics after all?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_GettingsfatherWantto: Greetings Father. Want to mix the magics?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_HahIdontthinksoToomu: Hah... I don't think so. Too much riding on you not getting hooked on this garbage.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_HahayoubetWanttogeti: Haha, you bet. Want to get in on the combination action? I'm sure you'll get your moneys worth.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_HeheIthoughtyoumight: Hehe. I thought you might like that, with your nazarene inclinations in mind, as well as being a "father." No pun intended.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Ialsopeddlealchemyoi: I also peddle alchemy oils that improve weapons.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_IcanunderstandthatWa: I can understand that. Want to combine some enchantments?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Idontfancymyselfanen: I don't fancy myself an enchanter, more of a scribe. The enchantments themselves are originally of Shuen origin.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Illgetcleanassoonasy: I'll get clean as soon as you get done with what you're doing.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Illhavetoanywayfromw: I'll have to anyway, from what I've read there's no way someone can hold this type of attachment and leave this place.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Imainlyinterpretthet: I mainly interpret the texts and bastardize and combine them them to make them more potent, I'm sure the Shuen wouldn't look at this with favourable eyes...
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Imighttellyousomelat: I might tell you some later on... but right now, you know... I have expensive hobbies. I'm sure you understand.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Imstillnotmuchofabel: I'm still not much of a believer on the good book and all that beyond the sheer... "mass of belief" people lock their souls into.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_InSulfurSureTheypopu: In Sulfur? Sure. They pop up every now and then. Got enough coin and they will part ways of whatever auditory manifestation they picked up recently.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Intherealworldwhenwe: In the real world when we projected ourselves into their reality, you could see them every now and then. It was pretty obvious they knew we were there.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_IstaybecauseImgratef: I stay because I'm grateful. Or... I did. Now I'm staying because I bloody have to don't I? Haha!
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Itsnotrealyasmagical: It's not really as magical, it's more... alchemic in nature. Science magic, if you will.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Itsself-perpetuating: It's self-perpetuating. Discarding it as mere fairytales might be reasonable if you read into the dogma literally. It's not the stories that makes it powerful, it's the gathering of souls around a central idea.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Ivebeenresearchingth: I've been researching these things way before we passed over.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Iwascleanforthelonge: I was clean for the longest time, but, when I started crafting again I sort of... slipped back into it.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Iwaspartofanorderofm: I was part of an order of magi, messing about with every spritiual path imaginable... but frankly, a lot of is was pretty left handed to tell you the truth.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_KevinisthenameBeenpa: Kevin is the name. Been part of your congregation for quite some time now, Mr. Goldfish.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Mainlyhavebeenkeepin: Mainly have been keeping the books and doing signs, but since our passing my talents have somewhat reverted to the more... slightly unorthodox iconography, no pun intended. Heh.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Mainlythroughrituals: Mainly through rituals and... questionable spiritual practices, for most people anyway. The Shuen is as far as I know never present in, you know. "Normal fleshworld." So we'd have to go where they were.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_NaturallyWanttoexper: Naturally. Want to experiment with some enchant mixing?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_NoproblemSowanttocom: No problem. So, want to combine some enchantments?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Nottomentiontheresul: Not to mention the results being a lot more accurate and under the circumstances... safe.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Relapsingintotheoccu: Relapsing into the occult perhaps isn't the best thing for me personally. But atleast it's more use to us right now than keeping the books, and making posters and ringing bells.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Rememberthatonceanen: Remember that once an enchantment or oil  has been added, it can't be undone. So choose wisely.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Rulesofthegamehascha: Rules of the game has changed, wouldn't you agree? I don't remember you going all commando on "gods creatures" in the past, for example
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Self-explanatoryisnt: Self-explanatory isn't it? Curiosity, power, search for eternal life, the classics.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_SowanttomixitupYoull: So, want to mix it up? You'll need atleast two enchantments that would work together.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Stage1typeenchantmen: Stage 1 type enchantments are pure Shuen scrolls.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Stage2typeenchantmen: Stage 2 type enchantments are combined Stage 1 scrolls that are extra powerful.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Thatbeingsaidwanttod: That being said, want to desecrate their most sacred teachings by making linguistic chimeras?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Theoilsarebottlestha: The oils are bottles that you put on your weapons to improve them.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Theoilsthemselvesare: The oils themselves are a bit more simple. It was the bread and butter of the order as it didn't require us to risk... dying as much.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Therearetwotypesofen: There are two types of enchantments:
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Theresultsvariedfrom: The results varied, from nothing happening at all upon application to brothers going insane or... being destroyed in a variety of ways.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Wellinformationisfre: Well, information is free ain't it? We used to astraly project into what we think may have been the Shuen monastary and tried to copy texts we found from memory upon return.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_WhenIfirststumbledup: When I first stumbled upon the church I was on my knees, had blown half my soul across the cosmic web, and you still took me in, knowing what I was.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Whenwetranslatedtheg: When we translated the glyphs way back when we thought Shuen directly translated to "shining." But now that I've actually managed to have a conversation with them, it has been confirmed that it's just what they call themselves.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Whileyoucanhaveonlyo: While you can have only one enchantment per weapon, you can add any number of oils, but only one of each sort.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Yeahandforsuchanintu: Yeah, and for such an in tune race of people, I'm sure they'll see the bigger picture, and the sacrifices we made.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Yeahdoesntmatterwhat: Yeah, doesn't matter what concept or ideaology something is. From my experience the sheer intent of something that massive sends ripples.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Yeahtheresnothingval: Yeah, there's nothing valuable down this path. Perhaps you want to mix some magic instead?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_YeahwellletsseeWantt: Yeah well... let's see. Want to fuse some scrolls?
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Youcanactuallycookth: You can actually cook them up yourself, if you just know the recipes. But I keep some in store in case you need to buy them, it's the easy way.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Youknowyoureprobably: You know, you're probably the only person ever who's been interested in this topic except fidgety black robed "historians."
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Youllgetaslotforeach: You'll get a slot for each rank a weapon gains through experience.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Youllnoticewerenotge: You'll notice we're not getting many visitors from our flock these days.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_Youneedtobreaksomeeg: You need to break some eggs to make an omelett, I'm just glad it was never my... egg. If you catch my drift.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_andofcoursetheysella: ... and of course they are valuable. It's nice to be able to make a living out of your hobby. Just ask the Shuen.
Dialog/Scholar_NPC_butyouknowtohellwith: ... but you know, to hell with it, right?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Afterallsaidanddonet: After all said and done, the information is incredibly valubale to us today.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_AftereverythingIvedo: After everything I've done for you...
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Boooringsothenwhatdo: Boooring... so then, what do we do?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Butnowyouremixingmag: But now you're mixing magics again?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Canyoutellmesomeofth: Can you tell me some of the recipes?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_FairpointIhaveotherb: Fair point. I have other business with you, if you don't mind.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Hopefullyyoullmanget: Hopefully you'll manage to cut it out before then. I don't know how long this will take.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Idonthaveanyuseforth: I don't have any use for this right now.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_IllaskthemifIevermee: I'll ask them if I ever meet one.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Imnothereforyourcome: I'm not here for your comedy.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Imsureyoullfigureito: I'm sure you'll figure it out eventually. Until then...
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Iveheardthatsabigno-: I've heard that's a big no-no.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Letmeknowifyouneedan: Let me know if you need anything.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_NotsureIshouldpartak: Not sure I should partake in this right now...
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Notsuretheyrethetype: Not sure they're the type to trick... Let's hope this doesn't bite us in the behind.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_OhyeahHitmeupwithsom: Oh yeah? Hit me up with some of that.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Somethingsarebetterk: Some things are better kept as a mystery. Got some other business with you!
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Sorryforputtingyouup: Sorry for putting you up to this.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Soundsliketomethatth: Sounds like to me that there was a cost to pay.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Tellmemoreabouttheen: Tell me more about the enchantment process, I'd like to know what I'm buying into.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Weallhaveourparttopl: We all have our part to play, and now we have to part ways.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Weregladtohaveyoursu: We're glad to have your support, Kevin.
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Whatisthatblackstuff: What is that... black stuff in the corner of your mouth?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Wheredidyoulearntodo: Where did you learn to do these things?
Dialog/Scholar_PLA_Whydidyouneedtheseen: Why did you need these enchantments?
