Dialog/Skrip_PLA_AHolyCitySoyouGoblin: A Holy City? So you Goblins have faith?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_AnythingelseIshouldk: Anything else I should keep in mind if I find Gabba?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_ButIwanttocookwithth: But I want to cook with the Cheese! I love Cheese too!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_DoyouhaveanyQuestfor: Do you have any quests for me?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_DoyouknowanyFoodReci: Do you know any Food Recipes?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_EnoughaboutGabbaIhad: Enough about Gabba... I had a question about something else.
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_FascinatingAnywayyou: Fascinating... Anyway, you said you sell stuff?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Haveyouseenawitchpas: Have you seen a witch pass through here, by any chance?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_HiSkripWhatdoyousell: Hi, Skrip! What do you sell?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_HoldonasecondIhadmor: Hold on a second, I had more questions!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Howdidyoulearntospea: How did you learn to speak Human?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_IhadnoideaHangonIhav: I had no idea! Hang on, I have some more Ingredients.
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Ihavesomeotheringred: I have some other ingredients, too!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_InterestingDoesthisB: Interesting... Does this Big Goblin have a name?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Isnteverybodygoingto: Isn't everybody going to kill me if I get there?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_IthinkIhavesomemorei: I think I have some more ingredients...
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Itmadeascreechingnoi: It made a screeching noise, like a thousand leaking Sulfur Barrels.
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Lookedkindoflikeafir: Looked kind of like a fireball...
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Movinginthatdirectio: Moving in that direction, over there!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_NoTheCheeseismineSkr: No!!! The Cheese is mine, Skrip!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_OhHowdoyoumakeBroth: Oh! How do you make Broth?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_OhIguessIdonthaveany: Oh... I guess I don't have any Ingredients...
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_OkayIthinkIvegotenou: Okay, I think I've got enough information.
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_Teachmehowtocookwith: Teach me how to cook with the Cheese and I will sell it to you!
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_WhyarealltheotherGob: Why are all the other Goblins attacking me?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_WhydoyoupraytothisBi: Why do you pray to this... Big Goblin?
Dialog/Skrip_PLA_YouseeIhavetheseMush: You see, I have these Mushrooms...
Dialog/TerrifiedCultist_NPC_Firsttherewa: First there was one, then there were two, then there were fifteen...
Dialog/TerrifiedCultist_NPC_Fuckfuckfuck: Fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck...
Dialog/TerrifiedCultist_NPC_TheyalldiedF: They all died... Fuck fuck fuck.
Dialog/Terrorbaum_PLA_ItsOnlyMyImaginati: It’s only my imagination, it’s only my imagination...
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_NPC_Butthestormwi: But the storm will be here in the morrow, and I'm afraid my meek shelter won't stand a chance.
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_NPC_InreturnIwill: In return I will place my blessings upon you and your house, tirelessly, every day.
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_NPC_Pleaseletmein: Please, let me in and spare me the howling wind? Oh, I wish not to burden...
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_NPC_ThereforeIsta: Therefore, I stand before you... an old woman, begging. Will you give me shelter and protect my brittle bones?
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_NPC_YouknowthatIr: You know that I rarely leave the comfort of my woods...
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_PLA_Theresalwaysa: There's always another bed at The Original Sin.
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_PLA_Thinknothingo: Think nothing of it, feel free! Come inside, come inside. Have you eaten?
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_PLA_Thisplacemigh: This place might not be as sturdy as it looks, we would definitely accept any help.
Dialog/WitchFlashback1_PLA_Youwillbeofno: You will be of no burden madam, please come inside.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_NPC_IplacethemOut: I place them... Outside the church and in. It's a protective barrier.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_NPC_Itsablessedta: It's a blessed tar. Candles dipped in sulfur dust... To strengthen the flame.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_NPC_Itwillstopany: It will stop any spirit with ill will. You can trust me on this, Father.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_NPC_Ohyoustartled: Oh, you startled me a bit, Father.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_PLA_Ahjusthadthes: Ah, just had the strongest déjà vu.
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_PLA_ApologiesCanI: Apologies. Can I ask you... What it is that you're doing there?
Dialog/WitchFlashback2_PLA_Thatsoneparti: That's one... particular set of skills. Carry on then.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_NPC_Butthestormwi: But the storm will be here in the morrow, and I'm afraid my meek shelter won't stand a chance.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_NPC_InreturnIwill: In return I will place my curses upon you and your house, tirelessly, every day.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_NPC_Pleaseletmein: Please, let me in and spare me the howling wind?
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_NPC_ThereforeIsta: Therefore, I stand before you... an old woman, demanding. Will you give me shelter and protect my teeny, weeny, tiny, brittle bones? Hehe.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_NPC_YouknowthatIr: You know that I rarely leave the comfort of my wood...
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_PLA_Theresalwaysa: There's always another bed at The Original Sin.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_PLA_Thinknothingo: Think nothing of it, feel free! Come inside, come inside. Have you eaten?
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_PLA_Thisplacemigh: This place might not be as sturdy as it looks, we would definitely accept any help.
Dialog/WitchFlashback3_PLA_Youwillbeofno: You will be of no burden madam, please come inside.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_NPC_Earthmotherma: Earth mother magic at its finest.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_NPC_Implacingthem: I'm placing them, here there and everywhere. It's a soul prison barrier.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_NPC_Itsthemostwon: It's the most wonderful curse. Candles dipped in sulfur dust... To strengthen the hate.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_NPC_Itwillstopany: It will stop any soul that tries to escape. It will stare at you with eyes of the accuser. But you've seen this. Hehe.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_NPC_Soontheywilla: Soon they will all be burn to a crisp. And it's all my fault.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_PLA_Ahjusthadthes: Ah, just had the strongest déjà vu.
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_PLA_ApologiesCanI: Apologies. Can I ask you... What it is that you're doing there?
Dialog/WitchFlashback4_PLA_Thatsoneparti: That's one... particular set of skills. Carry on then.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_NPC_AndIwilldestr: And I will destroy you all, and trap you forever.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_NPC_Iprojectmysel: I project myself to you, in my treacherous form, knowing, that you don't have a choice but to let me in.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_NPC_Iwillusethiss: I will use this storm as an excuse for you to let me into your most holy of places.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_NPC_Prettypleasei: Pretty please, ignore your senses and prejudices against the earth magics and lead your people to their doom.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_NPC_YouknowIwould: You know I wouldn't be here if I didn't want to hurt you.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_PLA_Theresalwaysa: There's always another bed at The Original Sin.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_PLA_Thinknothingo: Think nothing of it, feel free! Come inside, come inside. Have you eaten?
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_PLA_Thisplacemigh: This place might not be as sturdy as it looks, we would definitely accept any help.
Dialog/WitchFlashback5_PLA_Youwillbeofno: You will be of no burden madam, please come inside.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_AbsolutelyNothinglik: Absolutely! Nothing like a tiny mistake getting yourself and everyone your love burnt alive, then stuck in post-death hellscape and reliving a horror story over and over again for decennia.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_AhyourecallHu-hu-hus: Ah, you recall. 'Hu-hu-hu, sniffles, please let me in... the storm is coming'. Your kindness weakened you, and you and your lot paid the price, and you're about to pay again.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Andeventhoughitfeels: And even though it feels good to be back in physical form rather than only living inside an amulet. I'm getting slightly bored of this.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Andforthecountlessti: And for the countless time, I'm delivering, again. True to my word.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_AtthispointSurvivalT: At this point? Survival. Try being reduced to an amulet for who knows how long.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Besideswhatifyoudefe: Besides... what if you defeat me and nothing really changes?
Dialog/Witch_NPC_ButintheendIcannotle: But in the end I can not let the last shard of my soul be forgotten. So, feel free to pick it up, it really is your only option.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Butyoucantelltherear: But you can tell, there are slight variations every time. Eventually the tide will turn.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Evenwithallthisexpla: Even with all this explanation? You'll piece it together eventually...
Dialog/Witch_NPC_FiestyasusualRightyo: Feisty as usual. Right, you know what to do. Pick up the amulet and close the circle.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Franklygettingabitbo: Frankly getting a bit bored of this as well so I'm just going to tell you the truth this time.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_HahThatswhereitbecom: Hah. That's where it becomes interesting. If you don't pick it up, case you would lose your life, you'll be stuck in Sulfur...
Dialog/Witch_NPC_HahaThatsthespiritPr: Haha. That's the spirit. Presuming you can live with your church and everyone you know being turned into charcoal. Win or lose.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Hahanowwouldntthatbe: Haha, now wouldn't that be a comfort.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Hastodowiththenature: Has to do with the nature of things, the earth crawls in when the windows are open. Stagnation is the prey of decomposition.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_HellopriestDoyoureco: Hello, priest. Do you recognize me?
Dialog/Witch_NPC_IamthewitchIamtheamu: I am the witch. I am the amulet. This is your church. This is the real world. Your people are alive in the hatch underneath. I locked them in, while they were taking shelter from the storm.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_IfIdefeatyouyougetto: If I defeat you, you get to end up in Sulfur. And you'll most likely find me here again, I will actually help you do it. It is after all the way we are intertwined.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_IfIgetdefeatedIneedt: If I get defeated, I need to lead you all the way back here so we can get a quick do over.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Ihavetoadmitthedowns: I have to admit the downside of you wearing it, coming back to life in Sulfur even if I defeat you is a bit of a nuisance.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Imgrowingwearyofallt: I'm growing weary of all this talk. Let's close the circle. Pick up the amulet.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Imsureyoumissmehangi: I'm sure you miss me hanging around your neck like a cold noose. So pick it up, and meet your destiny.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_ImtheamuletdummyIhav: I'm the amulet, dummy. I have many shapes.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_ItsactuallymyamuletI: It's actually my amulet. If you haven't figured that out yet. And this is where you got the amulet in the first place. Pick it up, fight me, and have the snake bite it's tail.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Itsnotlikeyoullberem: It's not like you'll be remembering anyway.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Itstheonlyscenariowh: It's the only scenario where I get a chance to stop my body from turning to ash in the pits of the Caves.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Ivetoldyouprettymuch: I've told you pretty much every combination of lies and sentences I can muster in this exact scenario.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Letthisbeourfinalbat: Let this be our final battle.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Nownowtherewerewarni: Now now, there were warning signs along the way, were there not? A priest must tend to their flock.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_OhhahatrustmeIvealre: Oh, haha, trust me, I've already met my maker. You'll understand soon enough.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Ohthereitistheamulet: Oh, there it is, the amulet, on the floor. Curious right? Pick it up and let's see where we branch off this time.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Ohyouactuallyremembe: Oh... you actually remember? That's... interesting. Then you know what's about to happen next.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Orperhapsitsyouwhowi: Or perhaps it's you, who will get defeated, and stray from the path and stop trying.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Perhapsthechurchwont: Perhaps the church won't burn down this time? Perhaps I will be defeated forever?
Dialog/Witch_NPC_PickuptheamuletWellb: Pick up the amulet. We'll both need it for insurance.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_RightHerewegoagainPi: Right! Here we go again. Pick it up whenever you're ready.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Rightbusinessasusual: Right, business as usual. You lose your memory every time, but know this; I remember.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_SighIamthewitchIamth: Sigh. I am the witch. I am the amulet. This is your church.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Sopickuptheamuletand: So, pick up the amulet, and prepare to return to the soil, "Father".
Dialog/Witch_NPC_SowhatdoyousayDidyou: So, what do you say? Did you tend to them well? They sound a bit... distraught.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Thatsadissapointingl: That's a... dissapointingly basic take honestly. But no matter, fits the narrative.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Theamuletwasthelastf: The amulet was the last figment of my being, and to have any chance of returning to form, I needed to regain my power from the Earth Mother, and turn back time to this point.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Thepowersyouhavegath: The powers you have gathered through the Earth Mother, via the shrines, allows me to manifest again. As well as recreate this whole scenario.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_ThisiswhatIpromisedy: This is what I promised you at the start, over and over. You can get your revenge, you can undo all the bad and save them.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Vineswillgrowfromthe: Vines will grow from the ashes of this place. And the forest will regrow.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Wehavecomefarhumanfr: We have come far, human friend. It's almost nostalgic.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Wellthenwheneveryour: Well then, whenever you're ready to pick up the amulet and get this over with.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Whowouldntwanttosulk: Who wouldn't want to sulk around in the ashes of their loved ones, weapon in one hand, booze in the other.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Youarebutamanyouneed: You are but a man, you need your rest. I wouldn't hold it against you. You could always stay in Sulfur, it's not so bad after all, right?
Dialog/Witch_NPC_YougetitnowrightHoww: You get it now, right? How we're pretty much stuck with each other.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_YouletyourguarddownI: You let your guard down. It's nothing personal.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Youmaythinkyouvebeen: You may think you've been racing me all over Sulfur. In reality my body was a burnt pile of coal somwhere in a random pit in the goblin Caves.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_Youreclearlynotweari: You're clearly not wearing it. I haven't given it to you yet. Check for yourself, then pick it up and let's get this show on the road.
Dialog/Witch_NPC_andasIvebeenguidingy: ... and as I've been guiding you, helping you along, giving you purpose. If you should fall here, without the amulet,  you'll be lost wandering Sulfur without purpose, ending up in the Infinite Void™.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_DonttestmeIremembery: Don't test me, I remember you.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Enoughcharadeswevebe: Enough charades, we've been through this.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Fairenoughvengeancew: Fair enough, vengeance will be mine.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_FranklyIdontgetitata: Frankly? I don't get it at all...
Dialog/Witch_PLA_GuessIcouldsmashitwi: Guess I could smash it with a hammer when I'm done with you.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Idontunderstandanyof: I don't understand any of this at all...
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Illjustleavetheamule: I'll just leave the amulet there.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Imadeaslightlybadjud: I made a slightly bad judgement call, that's it.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Iveseenyouinmydreams: I've seen you in my dreams.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Iwillburyyouintheear: I will bury you in the earth, where you belong.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_NohagImeanwhydidyout: No, hag. I mean why did you target us in the first place?
Dialog/Witch_PLA_OhIgetitloudandclear: Oh, I get it, loud and clear. You're liar! You've been lying to me all along!
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Thisoneisformypeople: This one is for my people.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_WhatifIdontpickupthe: What if I don't pick up the amulet?
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Whyismyamuletonthefl: Why is my amulet on the floor?
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Youarenofriendofmine: You are no friend of mine.
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Youreabouttopayforwh: You're about to pay for what you did to us!
Dialog/Witch_PLA_Youusedourgoodfaitha: You used our good faith, and we paid the price. Now I get my revenge and save my people.
QuestGiver/Bill_Items: Heh. I guess if you have enough time. If you come across this. I'd appreciate it.
QuestGiver/BlondMagus_Items: If it puts a lot of distance between you and me, I might. Fetch me... I don't know, let's say...
QuestGiver/CongregationRepairman_Items: You don't have enough to do with all the shit going on? (Blows out smoke) Fine. Could always use cleaning gear and random parts. How about you bring me this?
QuestGiver/CongregationScavenger_Items: Always looking for some good contraban-... I mean stuff. Right now I'm particularly interested in this.
QuestGiver/CongregationScholar_Items: Hah! Yeah, there's a couple of things I can never really get enough of. This for example...
QuestGiver/FexShuen_Items: You would aid me in my gathering? How graceful. I'm currently searching for this. You will be rewarded.
QuestGiver/GraveDigger_Items: Quests? Hue-hue-hue. I'm a bit peckish so I guess I could come up with something. Bring me this.
QuestGiver/Grocer_Items: Always looking for meat, naturally. And parts, I guess. Heh! Right now I'm a bit low on this.
QuestGiver/HauklandSalesman_Items: I always have use for weapons and weapon related gadgets to study, especially from competitors. How about you get me this?
QuestGiver/PrepperDefector_Items: Well, see I'm pretty tired of pine cones and stuff. I dream of so many foods from my days of living in society. Perhaps if you would find me this?
QuestGiver/Qiosk_Items: You know what? I'll take that, getting to be the one served for once will feel pretty damn good. I have sweet tooth so I'll have...
QuestGiver/RatQueen_Items: As you can see, there's not a lot of fashion going on down here. If you could find me this, perhaps I'd be presentable enough to show my face around town again.
QuestGiver/Skrip_Items: YOU NO I LIKE SHINY TINGS, HAHA! AND CHEESE! RIGHT NOW I WANT DIS.
